text: TWENTY STORMTROOPERS. Holding on at attention, moving to the ship's rhythm, in the tense moments before a raid. A FILTERED COMMAND and they LOCK AND LOAD their heavy blast rifles. The BRUTAL NOISE is replaced by SUDDEN, SHOCKING

WIDE SHOT of a small, peaceful village. Distant sounds of native animals. A single wind chime. Suddenly a DROID RISES INTO FRAME, CLOSE: ROUND and SKITT orange and white, this is BB-8. Focuses on something past camera. He BEEPS -- FAST, MORSE CODE-LIKE SOUNDS, clearly worried. Moves EVEN CLOSER TO CAMERA -- is MORE worried -- BEEPS more -- then TURNS AND

CLOSE ON A HAND: a small LEATHER SACK is placed in the pa The hand closes. Another OLDER HAND covers it. In a primitive HUT, an old explorer, LOR SAN TEKKA, (rugg kind) has handed the mysterious sack to POE DAMERON (32, a pilot's jacket). Poe has charisma, a natural spark:
This will begin to make things right. I've traveled too far, and seen too much, to ignore the despair in the galaxy. Without the Jedi, there can be no balance in the Force.
Well, because of you now we have a chance. The General's been after this for a long time.
"The General." To me, she's royalty. Well, she certainly is that.
BB-8 ENTERS FRANTIC, BEEPS. Concerned, Poe turns to Lor S Tekka.
We've got company.

The men exit fast. Poe moves TO CAMERA, raises QUADNOCULA POE'S POV: LIGHTS on the horizon -- approaching ENEMY SHI POE lowers the quadnocs -- PUSH IN ON HIS UNNERVED EYES. GROWING, FRIGHTENING THUNDER.
You have to hide.
You have to leave. Go! Poe turns to him. Conflicted. Finally nods, hurries off. BB-8 follows.
TRACK FAST with Poe as he and BB-8 hurry through the vill various ARMED VILLAGERS taking position, prepared to defe
A ROAR of WIND and DUST: the TRANSPORTS LAND. Stormtroope come out FIRING BLASTERS -- the VILLAGERS FIRE BACK -- ma are HIT!
Poe runs to an X-WING fighter, parked at a distance from village, hidden behind a ROCK OUTCROPPING.

Come on, BB-8! Hurry! Poe sends BB-8 into the droid socket / co-pilot seat -- h moves to the cockpit -- the CONTROLS COME TO LIFE. As the CANOPY CLOSES, Poe shoots a quick look back: the ENEMY AR IN THE DISTANCE. Poe urgently works the controls -- BB-8 BEEPS. The X-WING LANDING LIGHTS COME ON, ENGINES WHINE TO LIFE! But just then: Poe's ship is suddenly HIT BY BLASTERFIRE! Poe turns to look: two STORMTROOPERS CHARGE HIS WAY, FIRING!

I see 'em! BB-8 BEEPS nervously as Poe GRABS HIS CONTROLS and FIRES THEM, using the X-wing's drop-down antipersonnel blaster! The two Troopers are BLOWN AWAY in the large BLAST HITS! Poe tries to start the ship now, but the ENGINES SPUTTER. Concerned, he opens his canopy, jumps down, moves to the back of his ship: BAD DAMAGE ON THE REAR ENGINE PANEL. They're in trouble.
Lor San Tekka moves sadly through the village as STORMTRO wielding FLAME THROWERS destroy structures. Surrendering Villagers are ROUNDED UP. Penned ANIMALS panic.
Back at the X-wing, Poe kneels beneath his ship, pulls fr the leather sack a SMALL, OLD ARTIFACT which he inserts i BB-8 -- the droid's MULTI-READER ENVELOPS it.
You take this. It's safer with you than it is with me. You get as far away from here as you can. Do you hear me? (BB-8 BEEPS, hesitates) I'll come back for you! It will be alright.
BB-8 watches Poe run off. BEEP-WHINES nervously, then tur and heads off. Turns back once to look at Poe, then ROLLS AWAY. Poe uses his blaster rifle to fire at incoming troo from cover.

The Troopers and villagers in battle -- as one Trooper is HIT and goes down. Another -- OUR TROOPER -- KNEELS to he The hit trooper raises a torn, bloody glove -- his HUMAN HAND visible -- and MARKS OUR STORMTROOPER'S MASK WITH BL just before he dies. Our Trooper, stands -- overwhelmed b the battle.

The shuttle craft door OPENS -- through the wind and smok KYLO REN exits the ship: a TALL, DARK FIGURE, he strides through the chaos toward San Tekka. A senior Trooper moves to our blood-marked Trooper, and o

Stay here. Our Trooper nods. Kylo Ren stops before the outraged Lor San Tekka, dwarfin him. Only now does it become apparent that Kylo Ren wears DARK MASK, marked by battle. Inset metal lines reflect FI
Look how old you've become.
Something far worse has happened to you. Our blood-marked TROOPER is placed in line with other stormtroopers.
You know what I've come for.
I know where you come from. Before you called yourself Kylo Ren.
The map to Skywalker. We know you've found it, and now you're going to give it to the First Order. Adjacent to the village, Poe enters frame -- sees the Ren Tekka exchange continue.
The First Order rose from the dark side... you did not.
I'll show you the dark side.
You may try, but you cannot deny the truth that is your family. Suddenly Kylo Ren raises his LIGHTSABER -- IGNITES IT --

head_text.subj: PERPENDICULAR SMALLER BLADES AT THE HILT, A UNIQUE BUZZ -
YELLOW/RED ENERGY, SPITTING SPARKS AND SMOKE --

text: You're so right. And as he RIPS IT DOWN ACROSS SAN TEKKA! Poe, RUNNING, SEES THIS AND YELLS, AIMS HIS BLASTER AND F AT KYLO REN! Instantly: Kylo Ren RAISES HIS HAND -- POE'S BLAST FREEZES -- THE BO

head_text.subj: OF ENERGY STRAINING AND VIBRATING IN MID AIR

text: Kylo Ren sees Poe, who suddenly CANNOT MOVE, but strains He is grabbed by Stormtroopers who drag him past the VIBRATING, FROZEN BLAST, to Kylo Ren. A Stormtrooper begins a brutal PAT DOWN. Kylo Ren moves closer. Poe just glares. The Stormtrooper KICKS OUT Poe's legs -- he lands hard on his knees. Kylo Ren kneels to look at Poe.
So who talks first? You talk first?
The old man gave it to you.
It's just very hard to understand you with all the...
Search him.
... Apparatus. The Troopers roughly pull Poe away. A Stormtrooper begins brutal PAT DOWN. Kylo Ren moves closer. Poe just glares as the pat down ends.
Nothing, sir.
Put him on board. Kylo Ren regards the Stormtroopers with the rounded up Villagers, then turns to the CHROME-SKINNED, FEMALE BLACK CAPED HEAD STORMTROOPER, CAPTAIN PHASMA.
Sir, the villagers.
Kill them all. Phasma nods, steps forward:
On my command! The Troopers, including OURS, aim at the Villagers.

Fire! Poe is roughly PULLED into a transport ship, the ramp LIF All around our Trooper BLASTERFIRE ERUPTS -- but we're WI ENOUGH to see he ISN'T FIRING. PUSH IN until the FIRING STOPS. All the Stormtroopers SPREAD OUT TO SEARCH -- exce ours. Kylo Ren heads back toward his ship. But then he STOPS. Feels something. TURNS AND LOOKS AT OUR STORMTROOPER for LONG MOMENT. Our Trooper can barely meet his gaze; knows he's doomed. Kylo Ren then heads off -- passes the FROZEN BLAST, which after a beat, GOES FREE AND SLAMS INTO A NEARBY STRUCTURE scaring the hell out of our Stormtrooper.
A Stormtrooper climbs down from the cockpit of Poe's X-wi
Nothing here. Go ahead! Three other Stormtroopers FIRE LASER CANNONS at the X-win destroying the ship in a LARGE EXPLOSION.

BB-8 rolls across the sand, looks back: the X-wing FIREBA BB-8, afraid, continues on his own in a mysterious, dark desert. We see a FORM -- an animal, its RED EYES LIFTING from the sand, watching the rolling droid, who just keeps going. In a WIDE SHOT, we HEAR HIM BEEPING to himself, lonely an frightened.
With the SANDY PLANET OF JAKKU as backdrop, Troop Transpo and Kylo Ren's Shuttle approach a massive STAR DESTROYER.
Poe, shackled, is ushered from the transport through the hangar. He is awed by the imposing space.
All right. All right! Our Stormtrooper passes, moves fast:

Our Stormtrooper enters the dark, vehicle. He removes his helmet. His head comes up and we PUSH IN ON HIS FACE FOR THE FIRST TIME. This is FN-2187. He is 23, likable. But in this moment, terrified, desperate. After a beat, behind him, CAPTAIN PHASMA enters. FN-2187 knows he's in trouble.
FN-2187. Submit your blaster for inspection.
Yes, Captain.
And who gave you permission to remove that helmet?
I'm sorry, Captain.
Report to my division at once.
Phasma heads off. Shattered, FN-2187 replaces his helmet.

A metal sheet is pulled open to reveal the wrapped up fac of A SCAVENGER, perhaps alien, in GOGGLES, FACE MASK and GLOVES. Backpack with a STAFF strapped to it. Uses TOOLS to remove various MECHANISMS from inside the wall. We are in an upside-down, canted CORRIDOR. The Scavenger finds a valuable piece, drops it in a SATCHEL. Swings the bag back and begins CLIMBING DOWN on a cable, between treacherous WALLS OF MACHINERY, headed to:
Alone and tiny in this massive, sideways wreck, the Scave descends, climbing down a two-hundred foot-long cable. LA HARD onto rusty metal.
The Scavenger carries the satchel and another large, foun piece, over enormous pipes in the vast space, heads throu the dust toward a distant SLIT OF SUNLIGHT.

The Scavenger arrives from the darkness and pulls off gog and gear, revealing the grimy face of a beautiful, young WOMAN. This is REY, 19. She opens her canteen, shakes out the two final drops int her mouth. HITS THE SIDE of the canteen again and again f whatever she can get. CUT WIDE: Rey is rendered minuscule, standing at the bottom of an E

head_text.subj: ENGINE OF A DECAYING, CRASHED STAR DESTROYER

text: of her canteen-hitting. She sets her things on a piece of sheet metal and sits next to it, sliding down the sand du She RIDES DOWN THE MOUNTAIN OF SAND. WE HOLD FOR A LONG TIME, looking down, as she recedes from us, toward the di SALT FLATS below. Random SCATTERED DEBRIS. Her SPEEDER, tiny from here. Rey moves to her junker SPEEDER, jumps on, fires the sput engine and DRIVES OFF.
Rey races along the desert floor: a GRAVEYARD OF CRASHED SPACESHIPS.
Rey's speeder PASSES us, heading for a dusty, desert town Refueling, small trade, scavengers.
CRASH! Rey's sack carrying her heavy FOUND OBJECTS hits t sand. Working like a tough seaman, Rey hauls the sack fro her speeder toward the town.

TIGHT ON REY'S HANDS as she SCRUBS CLEAN her day's salvag Rey glances up: she looks at an old woman, also cleaning some salvage. Rey watches her, gets lost in the simple moment. A small, passing alien UNDERLING barks something to her in another language. She returns to work.
Rey looks up to a SERVICE WINDOW: two feet above her, beh a protective screen, is her boss, UNKAR PLUTT (50, blobfi unclean). He examines her pieces. Then he offers:

What you've brought me today is worth... Hmmm... One quarter portion. Though disappointed, Rey barely shows it. She nods thanks Unkar pushes through his transfer drawer a SEALED PACKET: DRIED GREEN MEAT in one section, BEIGE POWDER in another. She takes it. She swallows her resentment and heads off.
The IMMENSE SETTING SUN against the FLAT TERRAIN. Rey's SPEEDER races, almost insignificant, across frame.

She SCRATCHES MARKS into the rusty wall. Another MARK; another DAY. And there are THOUSANDS of marks. A SIZZLING SOUND over: A DRIED DESERT FLOWER in a rusty E PIECE. A rough, stuffed HANDMADE DOLL, made from what loo like orange Rebellion flight suit material and twine. Rey's lonely, ramshackle dwelling. Everything reclaimed. She cooks for one. Does everything for one. She opens the POWDER, moves to the makeshift WOK, where the GREEN MEAT SIZZLES. Pours the powder into milky WATER in a tin. Stir it. It GROWS INTO A LOAF as she puts the meat on an old plate. Grabs the loaf.

Rey sits, eats like a starving child. Every last drop. Licks the metal plate. Looks out at the horizon. A single silent ship heads off, a shimmering, thin contrail. She wipes her mouth. Picks up an old, broken REBELLION HELMET

CONTINUED: just 'cause. Puts it on, WIDE SHOT of Rey sitting, alone and isolated, on the leg an ANCIENT, FALLEN AT-AT in which she lives. Then, a distant ELECTRONIC SQUEAL -- instantly she's up, helmet too big, she rips it off. Hears ANOTHER BEEPING SQUEAL. She hurries to her QUARTERSTAFF and runs off. Rey climbs a dune. RISE WITH HER, revealing BB-8, caught a NET but fighting back, being held by a TEEDO (a small, brutish desert tyrant), who rides a LUGGABEAST. The teedo YELLS at BB-8, who BEEPS madly, struggling to free himsel Rey watches this injustice for a beat, finally YELLING OU
Tal'ama parqual! The Teedo and BB-8 STOP, GO SILENT, turn to her.

Parqual zatana! A half beat and the Teedo YELLS SOMETHING BACK, threateni BB-8's head swivels to him, then back to Rey, like watchi a tennis match. Rey angrily moves to them, pulling a knife from her pouch Rey starts CUTTING BB-8 out of the netting. The Teedo fre out, YELLING. Rey suddenly stands, turns to the Teedo and says, fiercely:
The Teedo barks a sort of "AHHHHH!" (As if to say, "GO TO HELL!"), Then heads off on his beast. This prompts BB-8 t start BEEP-YELLING at the departing bully, provocatively.
Shhhh. BB-8 quiets instantly. The two watch the Teedo head off. Finally, BB-8 BEEPS a question. She KNEELS to him.
That's just Teedo. Wants you for parts. He has no respect for anyone. Your antenna's bent. (considers BB-8 for the first time,
Where do you come from?
Classified. Really? Me too. Big secret. (points to horizon) Niima Outpost is that way, stay off Kelvin Ridge.
Keep away from the Sinking Fields in the north, you'll drown in the sand. (stands, heads off)
BB-8 starts after her, BEEPS. She turns sharply, he stops

Don't follow me. Town is that way. (he BEEPS again) No! She heads off again. Finally he BEEPS to her -- something SWEET this time. That he is alone, scared, has no one els This makes her stop. She turns and looks at him. Not liki him. But a gesture of her head says, reluctantly, "Come on." BB-8 quickly moves to her. They head off together.
In the morning, you go.
You're welcome. The two disappear behind a dune.
Three TIE fighters head to the massive ship high above Ja
POE, shackled to a chair, BEATEN, wakes up.
I had no idea we had the best pilot in the Resistance on board. Comfortable? Through battered lips:
Not really.
I'm impressed. No one has been able to get out of you what you did with the map.

Might wanna rethink your technique. Kylo Ren says nothing, reaches out to him. Poe flinches i the chair as Kylo Ren reaches for his face, not touching him. Poe is soon in agony, remains in horrible silence --
Where is it?
The Resistance will not be intimidated by you.
Where... is it? Poe can't take it -- he BEGINS TO SCREAM and we CUT TO:
WHOOOSH! The cell door SLIDES UP. Kylo Ren exits, fierce, confronts GENERAL HUX (34, scary) who awaits him:
It's in a droid. A BB unit.
Well then. If it's on Jakku, we'll soon have it.
I leave that to you.
BB-8 is dropped to the sand.
Don't give up. He still might show up. Whoever it is you're waiting for. Classified. I know all about waiting. BB-8 BEEPTALKS a question.
For my family. They'll be back. One day. Come on. She tries to force a smile, but can't, really. She heads off. BB-8 BEEPS... then heads after her.
Rey stands with BB-8 in front of Unkar Plutt, at his wind He reviews her goods. He glances quickly at BB-8.
These five pieces are worth... Let me see here... One half portion.
Last week they were a half portion each. She hates him. He leans forward.
What about the droid?
What about him?
I'll pay for him. BB-8 doesn't like this at all. Rey is awkward, but curiou

Sixty portions. CLOSE ON HER. Stunned. Literally hungry for this amount o food, her stomach practically rumbles. BB-8 sees her interest and BEEPS furiously, not liking th conversation at all. She looks at Unkar. Looks down at BB-8. Considers it all. Finally, she hears herself say:
Actually... the droid's not for sale.
Come on. Unkar furious. Rey, then BB-8, head out. Recovering, Unka watches her go with dark eyes. He picks up a communicator
Follow the girl and get that droid. He SLAMS the service window door SHUT.
The cell door WHOOSHES OPEN -- a STORMTROOPER enters. Poe remains shackled, worse for wear. A TROOPER GUARD here.
Ren wants the prisoner. TIGHT ON POE, in pain, drained, as the Guard unshackles h
An exhausted, handcuffed Poe is walked down the corridor the Stormtrooper, who holds a blaster at Poe's body.
Turn here. Poe turns into a narrow passageway --
Heading down the narrow hall the Stormtrooper stops Poe.
Listen carefully: you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here.
If -- what--? The Stormtrooper pulls off his helmet: IT IS FN-2187.
This is a rescue, I'm helping you escape. Can you fly a TIE fighter?
You with the Resistance--?!
What?
No no no! I'm breaking you out. Can you fly a TIE fighter?
I can fly anything. Why, why are you helping me?
Because it's the right thing to do.
(it hits him) You need a pilot.
I need a pilot. And Poe, seeing this is for real, smiles a hero's smile.
We're gonna do this.
(unsure but hopeful) ... Yeah?
WIDE SHOT ESTABLISHING the hangar. Find FN-2187, again masked, walking with Poe. By all appearances he's escorti a prisoner. A group of OFFICERS passes in the opposite direction.
Okay, stay calm, stay calm.
I am calm.
I'm talking to myself.
Not yet. Okay, go. This way. FN-2187 walks quickly toward the far wall -- Poe follows up the stairs to a two-man SPECIAL FORCES TIE FIGHTER --
FN-2187 and Poe (wincing, sore) drop into the back-to-bac cockpit. FN-2187 pulls off his helmet as Poe removes his cuffs and jacket, fires up the ship with excitement.
I always wanted to fly one of these things. Can ya shoot?
Blasters, I can!
Okay, same principal! Use the toggle on the left to switch between missiles, cannons, and mag pulse -- use the site on the right to aim, triggers to fire!
This is very complicated FWOOOOOOM! The TIE FIGHTER LURCHES FORWARD --
I can fix this.
WIDE: see the ship STRUGGLE TO RISE, CABLES connected to PULL BACK FAST to REVEAL we're inside the main control ro
We have an unsanctioned departure from bay two. WHIP TO a FIRST ORDER COLONEL, who responds:
Alert General Hux and stop that fighter.
The TIE Fighter LIFTS OFF from the bay, rips CHARGING cab Stormtroopers UNPACK and aim MEGABLASTERS.
FN-2187 opens fire.
FN-2187 TEARS UP PARKED TIE FIGHTERS and GUN EMPLACEMENTS WITH WELL-AIMED, STRATEGIC LASER BLASTS! Hits the CONTROL

head_text.subj: THE WINDOWS ARE BLOWN IN BY LASER BLASTS

text: I got it!
The TIE Fighter blasts from the ship --
Poe pilots -- amazed, almost enjoying it.
Woooahhh! This thing really moves. All right, we gotta take out as many cannons as we can or we're not gonna get very far!
All right!
I'm gonna get us in position, just stay sharp!
The TIE Fighter ARCS BACK, DIVES THROUGH THE OPENING BETW THE LEVELS OF THE MASSIVE SHIP, then FLIES DOWN AND BACK, along the ship's belly --
Poe flies toward the CANONS --
Up ahead! Up ahead! You see it? I've got us dead centered. It's a clean shot.
Okay, got it. FN-2187 gets a target, FIRES!
LASERS BLAST from the TIE Fighter -- A SERIES OF CANNONS EXPLODE! Our TIE Fighter SLICES THROUGH the debris!
FN-2187 YELLS in celebration:
YES! You see that?! DID YOU SEE
I saw it! Hey, what's your name?
Poe reacts, this tells him volumes about FN-2187's histor
FN-whaa?
That's the only name they ever gave me!
Well I ain't using it! FN, huh? Finn. I'm gonna call you Finn! That all right? Even in the madness, Finn can't suppress his smile.
"Finn." Yeah, "Finn", I like that! I like that!
I'm Poe. Poe Dameron.
Good to meet you, Poe!
Good to meet you too, Finn!
General Hux looks over the shoulder of LIEUTENANT MITAKA, a console.
Sir, they've taken out our turbolasers--
Use the ventral cannons.
Yes, sir. Bringing them online --
General Hux. Is it the Resistance pilot? Hux turns: Kylo Ren enters fast, looms large, angry.
Yes, and he had help.
From one of our own. PUSH IN ON REN as Hux says:
We're checking the registers now to identify which Stormtrooper it was.
... The one from the village. FN- 2187. Hux is unnerved that Ren knows -- he chalks it up to Ren' Force ability. Kylo Ren heads off.
Sir. Ventral cannons hot.
Fire.

Massive WARHEAD LAUNCHERS SPIN and FIRE BLASTS toward the TIE fighter, which flies EVASIVE MANEUVERS -- most blasts hit the DEBRIS from the TURBOLASER DESTRUCTION. The TIE fighter then PULLS A BIG TURN, BACK TOWARD JAKKU, THE SANDY PLANET WHERE POE LEFT BB-8.
One's coming towards you. My right, your left. Do you see it?
Hold on! I see it!
Nice shot. Finn looks up suddenly in alarm --
Where are you going?
We're going back to Jakku. That's where.
No no no! We can't go back to Jakku! We need to get outta this system! NEAR-MISS LASER BLASTS as Poe pilots aggressively.
I got to get to my droid before the First Order does!
What - a droid?!
That's right. He's a BB unit! Orange and white: one of a kind.
I don't care what color he is! No droid can be that important!
This one is, pal.
We need to get as far away from the First Order as we can! We go back to Jakku, we die!
That droid's got a map that leads straight to Luke Skywalker!
Oh, you gotta be kidding me!!! I-- Suddenly BAM! THEY ARE HIT!
The TIE FIGHTER SPARKS AND SMOKES, SPIRALING out of contr toward the surface of Jakku!
Captain Phasma and General Hux stand before a holographic projection detailing FN-2187's service records.
FN-2187 reported to my division, was evaluated and sent to Reconditioning.
No prior signs of non-conformity?
This was his first offense. A technician checks her readings, reports to General Hux.
General. They've been hit.
Destroyed?
Disabled. They were headed back to Jakku -- the fighter's projected to crash in the Goazon badlands.
They were going back for the droid -- send a squad to the wreckage.

TIGHT ON FINN'S FACE: His EYES OPEN. He goes from unconsc to terrified, fast. He sits up, looks around. CUT BACK WIDE: he sits in the middle of an EPIC DESERT, DUNES FORE A BLACK CHUTE blows in the wind behind him, scattered deb Then he sees, over distant dunes, RISING BLACK SMOKE. He gets up -- moves toward it, calling out:

Poe! Poe! Finn scrambles over the massive dune to the TIE FIGHTER, SMOKING AND ON FIRE, small debris around it. He thinks he sees POE'S ARM -- he pulls on it, but it's JUST POE'S JAC He throws that off and tries to find a way in -- even a w to LOOK INSIDE, but the smoke and heat make it impossible
Poe!!! POE! Suddenly the ship BEGINS TO SINK -- like it's being CONSU INTO QUICKSAND -- Finn is slipping in too --

It becomes clear fast: if Finn doesn't get away, he's gon get sucked in too! So Finn scampers away from the TIE FIG as it SINKS INTO THE SAND! We're in the Sinking Fields. A few moments and IT'S GONE. Finn's out of breath. Horrified. Then A GIANT EXPLOSION ERUPTS FROM below, SENDING SAND AND DEBRIS EVERYWHERE! Finn sees this, disoriented, scared, exhausted and defeat And all alone.
ENDLESS DUNES BEHIND HIM, Finn walks, removing pieces of Stormtrooper gear, using Poe's FLIGHT JACKET for shade.
Exhausted, Finn continues his trek across the endless, sa nothingness.
Finn, parched and losing hope, he walks to the edge of a massive dune, looks out into the epic valley below. Miles ahead: NIIMA OUTPOST.
General Hux and Kylo Ren walk the length of the bridge.
Supreme Leader Snoke was explicit. Capture the droid if we can, but destroy it if we must.
How capable are your soldiers, General?
I won't have you question my methods.
They're obviously skilled at committing high treason. Perhaps Leader Snoke should consider using a clone army.
My men are exceptionally trained -- programmed from birth--
Then they should have no problem retrieving the droid. Unharmed.
Careful, Ren. That your "personal interests" not interfere with orders from Leader Snoke.
I want that map. For your sake, I suggest you get it. Ren heads off. Hux hates him.
Sun-scorched and exhausted, Finn stumbles out of the dese into the Outpost. In a heatstroke daze he moves past enor old SHIP PARTS, MERCHANTS, SCAVENGERS and TENTED STALLS.

Water... water... water.. He sees a WATER TROUGH where a filthy, slobbering hippo-l creature (a HAPPABORE) DRINKS. Finn moves to it, uses his hands to desperately DRINK the filthy water. After a coup swallows he SPITS IT OUT, disgusted.

-- Awgh, GAH! But he's parched and immediately RETURNS FOR MORE. ACROSS THE MARKETPLACE, REY kneels with an emphatically BEEPING BB-8. Just then, TWO of UNKAR'S THUGS approach and stop her. On clearly tells her that they're taking the droid. BB-8 rea nervously as Rey resists them -- one pulls a SACK over BB while the other grabs Rey's arm -- in the tussle, Rey KNO OVER METAL URNS for sale -- Finn, still drinking, is PUSHED OVER by the happabore. He falls to the ground, then turns to look when he HEARS CRASHING. He sees, through the tents, REY FIGHTING. He moves UP CLOSER to help this young woman being accoste but he STOPS when Rey begins to FIGHT BACK -- scrappy and feral, she KICKS, BITES and HITS. Finn is taken aback as she DEFEATS the attackers, who hit the sand, hard. Finn just watches, stunned. Rey moves to the COVERED BB-8 -- PULLS THE SACK OFF OF HI Finn cannot believe his eyes. IT'S POE'S DROID! Rey talks to BB-8, who, nervous now, looks around and... SEES FINN! BB-8 STARTS BEEPING like crazy. Then something insane happens: REY LOOKS AT FINN.

(To BB-8) Who? Him? Finn is confused. Rey stands, staring at Finn, defiant. Finn can feel trouble coming -- and Rey begins CHARGING A HIM, quarterstaff in hand. Realizing he's the target, Finn begins to RUN -- away fro her, through the tent marketplace. Rey goes after him -- turns a corner -- then another -- then BAM! She's got ahead of him and SLAMS HIM TO THE GROUND WITH HER STAFF! Finn is on his back, out of breath and freaked out. She holds the staff on him threateningly:
What's your hurry, thief?
What--?! Thief? BB-8 ROLLS UP FAST, MOVES TO FINN -- a WELDING ARM TELESC

head_text.subj: FROM HIS BODY AND SHOCKS FINN

text: OW! HEY! What?!
The jacket! This droid says you stole it!
I've had a pretty messed up day, alright?! So I'd appreciate it you stop accusing me -- OW!!! (BB-8 has ZAPPED him

Where'd you get it? It belongs to his master. Finn looks at her -- then the agitated droid, Finn's mind racing. He puts it all together. Frustrated, but sighs heavily, needing to respond somehow. So he makes a hard decision: to tell the truth.
It belonged to Poe Dameron. That was his name, right? Rey and BB-8 react, surprised and wanting more.
He was captured... by the First Order! I helped him escape but our ship crashed.
Poe didn't make it. (sees BB-8 is sad,
Look, I tried to help him. I'm sorry... BB-8 heads off to the side, depressed. Rey watches BB-8, then considers Finn again. Says, a bit impressed:
So you're with the Resistance?
Finn's mind races again. He makes an easy decision: to li
Obviously. Yes. I am. I'm with the Resistance, yeah.
I'm with the Resistance. Rey lowers her staff, Finn stands. Rey studies him:
I've never met a Resistance fighter before.
Well, this is what we look like. Some of us. Others look different.
BB-8 says he's on a secret mission, he has to get back to your base.
Apparently he's carrying a map that leads to Luke Skywalker, and everyone's after it. She turns to him, concerned, curious. And asks:
Luke Skywalker? I thought he was a myth. Just then BB-8 BEEPS MADLY at something he sees.

What is it? Rey moves to him, peeks around a tent corner. Now Finn mo to see: at a distance, TWO STORMTROOPERS TALKING TO UNKAR THUGS -- who POINT THEIR WAY! Finn urgently grabs her hand and heads for the tents:
(re: her hand) What are you doing?!
Come on! Suddenly LASER BLASTS RIP PAST THEM, HIT THE CLEANING UNI SPEWING STEAM! Rey SCREAMS -- MORE BLASTS as they run!
Finn and Rey holding hands, the three race, ZIGZAGGING th a maze of tents:
Come on, BB-8!
Let go of me!
No, we gotta move!

(pulls her hand back) I know how to run without you holding my hand! BB-8 stay close! This way! Now Finn and BB-8 follow Rey -- ANOTHER BLAST just missin them! They disappear through a tent. TRACK FAST WITH STORMTROOPERS, through the tent maze. The come out of a tent, HAVING MOMENTARILY LOST THEIR TARGET.
Call in the air strike! REY, FINN AND BB-8 duck into another tent:
Rey, Finn and BB-8 move through RUSTY WARES and take cove Quiet, urgent:
They're shooting at both of us!
Yeah, they saw you with me! You're marked!
Well, thanks for that!
I'm not the one who chased you down with a stick! Does anyone have blasters around here?!
Are you okay? Finn QUIETS HER WITH A GESTURE, HEARING SOMETHING. PUSH IN ON FINN -- whatever he hears alarms him greatly - he GRABS HER HAND AGAIN -- PULLS HER AWAY --
Stop taking my hand!
Finn pulls Rey from the tent -- BB-8 FOLLOWS -- As they race from the tent a TIE FIGHTER SCREAMS INTO VIE

WIDE SHOT: TWO TIE FIGHTERS SCREAM OVER the town, the EXPLOSION throws sand and debris fifty feet into the air. Rey is thrown HARD to the ground -- she is rattled, truly afraid. Then she turns: FINN lies nearby, unconscious. Suddenly afraid, she scrambles to him, rolls him over. BB ROLLS OVER, BEEPING in concern.
Hey! As Finn comes to, he sees her. Through his fog:
-- Are you okay? And that very question touches her -- having never in her life been asked it.
Yeah. (extends her hand) Follow me. Grateful, Finn takes it. They're off. LOCALS run amok as TIE fighters DIVE BOMB. REY, Finn and
Rey, STAFF strapped to her back, leads the way as she, Fi and BB-8 race into the spaceport. Finn glances back: TWO TIE FIGHTERS BANK their return. They YELL:
We can't outrun them! Rey POINTS to a parked, four-engine SHIP ahead:
We might in that quad-jumper!
We need a pilot!
We've got one!
You?! (then, indicates one
What about that ship?
That one's garbage! They run for the JUMPER but the passing TIE FIGHTERS FIRE IT, BLOWING IT APART IN A HUGE FLAME BALL! Rey, coming to quick stop, RIGHT UP TO CAMERA:

The garbage'll do! She turns and runs back -- Finn and BB-8 follow as they a run toward the piece of junk -- and we see it for the fir time: THE MILLENNIUM FALCON! TIE fighters BANK AROUND AGAIN. Finn, Rey and BB-8 run up the ramp of the semi-tarped Falcon.
Finn, Rey and BB-8 enter the ship -- she hits a control a the door DESCENDS CLOSED as she races to the cockpit:
Gunner position's down there!
Y'ever fly this thing?
Rey tosses her staff aside, jumps into the pilot's seat, frantically flips switches. BB-8 rolls in behind her as t ENGINES WHINE to life:
No! This ship hasn't been flown in years!
Finn buckles into the gunner seat -- to his shock the SEA WHIPS TO THE LEFT, startling him -- he grabs the controls steady himself.
Great. (reacts to seat) Whoa! I can do this, I can do this--
Rey bucks herself up. Doesn't believe her quick words:
I can do this, I can do this-- Rey pulls the yoke:

head_text.subj: THE FALCON ENGINES LIGHT UP BRIGHT

text: The FALCON RISES, WILDLY -- ITS TARPS FLY OFF -- THE SHIP
From the tents, Unkar Plutt runs out, SCREAMS:
The Falcon BLASTS AWAY, two TIE FIGHTERS chase it, fast!
Rey pilots, headed for the sky! Finn SWINGS into frame, trying to work the GUNS.
Whoa! Hey! Oh! Stay low! Stay low!
Stay low! It confuses their tracking! For a crazy instant Rey LETS GO OF THE YOKE, stretches to the co-pilot controls -- THE FALCON CANTS!
BB-8, hold on! Rey finally REACHES the switches, returns to the yoke, stabilizing the ship, afraid of this next move.
BEHIND THE FALCON as it DRAMATICALLY BANKS AT AN UPWARD A UPSIDE-DOWN, then SWOOPS PERILOUSLY LOW across the sand. Two TIE FIGHTERS SCREAM past us!
In the cylindrical corridor, BB-8 ROLLS TO THE CEILING! Rey looks back for a flash as the TIE Fighters pass -- Th are ROCKED BY A BLAST!
What are you doing back there? Are you ever gonna fire back?!
Finn flicks switches -- The GUN TARGETING LIGHTS UP:
I'm working on it! Are the shields up? Rey strains, reaching for something in the co-pilot seat.
Not so easy without a co-pilot! Finn struggles with the gun controls and SWEEPING CHAIR:
Try sitting in this thing! Finn finally FIRES BACK at the two TIE FIGHTERS!
Finn's shots MISS. The TIE FIGHTERS ARC BACK IN PURSUIT a SCREAM PAST US toward the Falcon! Both TIES FIRING!
The BLACK-SUITED PILOT FIRES at the Falcon.
The Falcon is ROCKED by another BLAST!
We need cover, quick!
Rey HITS SWITCHES, pilots the best she can:
We're about to get some!
I hope.

The Falcon speeds through a ROCK FORMATION, GRAZING THE R TAKING OUT A CHUNK -- the two TIE Fighters in pursuit, FI The Falcon BANKS SO HARD, the edge of the ship RIPS A LIN IN THE SAND as it turns, REVEALING THE SHIP GRAVEYARD AHE
BB-8 EXTENDS MAGNETIC CABLES to brace himself in a corrid
Finn continues to fire at the TIE fighters, narrowly miss them.
Damn it! Rey maneuvers the ship deeper into the graveyard.
Finn SWOOPS into frame, FIRES --
Come on... come on... -- HITS AND SHATTERS the TIE FIGHTER!
Nice shot!
I'm getting pretty good at this!

The TIE FIGHTER CRASHES amid the DEBRIS, THREE SCAVENGERS instantly there to consume the new bounty. The Falcon, pursued by the ONE REMAINING TIE FIGHTER, sla through the MASSIVE WRECKAGE, GRAZING THE OLD SHIPS as sh goes, pieces flying. The TIE FIGHTER FIRES -- HITTING THE FALCON'S LOWER TURRE

head_text.subj: SPINNING IT, JAMMING IT INTO FORWARD POSITION

text: The cannon's stuck in forward position, I can't move it! You gotta lose 'em!
The ship is HIT AGAIN -- afraid, Rey's mind races as she scans the area -- and gets an idea.
Get ready!
Okay! For what?
Rey pilots the ship up AND INTO THE REAR OF A CRASHED SUP STAR DESTROYER! The final TIE FIGHTER FOLLOWS!
Finn peers out the window, realizing where they are:
The two ships slalom debris inside the giant ship -- the Falcon GRAZING ONE SIDE, THEN THE OTHER, SPITTING SPARKS!
Rey, scared, girds herself as she quickly runs out of spa in the wreck.
Oh no! Just as the TIE PILOT GETS A LOCK, Rey YANKS THE YOKE --
The Falcon makes a HARD RIGHT TURN out of the Destroyer. Rey then CUTS POWER AND FLIPS THE SHIP SO BACK FACES FRON FINN CAN NOW SEE THE PURSUING TIE FIGHTER! He FIRES,
REY GUNS THE ENGINES again, FLIPS THE FALCON and FLIES AW as the TIE FIGHTER CRASHES!
Whooo! The Falcon ROARS OFF, victorious, leaving the ship gravey and disappearing into the clouds.
The Falcon ROARS from Jakku off to space.
Rey excitedly unbuckles her seatbelt and hurries back.
Rey races past BB-8, who is RETRACTING his safety restrai Finn, adrenalized, climbs from the turret, meets Rey in t corridor, the LOUNGE in the b.g..

FINN Good shooting! Thanks! I-- Now that was some I don't know! -- I've flying! How did you flown some ships but I've do that?! No one never left the planet! trained you? No one? Your last shot was dead That was amazing! on. You got him with one (beat) blast! You set me up for it! (laughs) (cocky) It was perfect! That was pretty good. They're just staring at each other now, seeing something and weird and wonderful -- two people totally inexperienc in joy and camaraderie. Bb-8 BEEPS something urgent -- she turns to the droid, kn
You're ok. He's with the Resistance. He's going to get you home. We both will.
I don't know your name.
Finn. What's yours.
I'm Rey. BB-8 looks at him: really? Finn is reminded: HE'S LIED TO HER. She looks at Finn with a sweet smile.
Rey... But before Finn can say anything they JUMP: across the lo STEAM BURSTS from under the grating.
Help me with this! Quick! They hurry to the grating, PULL IT UP together. BB-8 roll over, watches.
Whoa! What's going on? She goes below as BB-8 BEEPS concern.
The First Order Star Destroyer above Jakku.
Lieutenant Mitaka moves to Ren, who looks out across the star field. Mitaka swallows, uneasy with his task.
Sir. We were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku. Ren turns to look at him, he says nothing.
It escaped capture aboard a stolen Corellian YT model freighter.
The droid... stole a freighter?
Not exactly, sir. It had help. Ren says nothing. Which says everything. Mitaka sweats.

We have no confirmation, but we believe FN-2187 may have been helped in the escape-- Ren IGNITES HIS LIGHTSABER, TURNS AND SLASHES AT THE CONS BEHIND HIM! HOLD ON Mitaka, who reacts, looks away -- win The horrible SOUNDS of Ren's rage continues. Finally Mita looks up. The metallic wall behind Ren is RIPPED with glo scars.
Anything else? Mitaka hates to say the following, but:
The two were accompanied by a girl. Ren reaches out -- Mitaka is suddenly, violently PULLED T REN, into his black glove:
What girl?
Rey's head POPS up from under the grating, surrounded by STEAM. An EMERGENCY ALARM BLARES.
It's the motivator! Grab me a Harris wrench -- check in there! As he checks a storage box, she disappears down below, overwhelmed by the technical issues --
How bad is it?!
If we wanna live, not good! BB-8 watches as Finn searches A SELECTION OF TOOLS:
They're hunting for us now, we gotta get outta this system! Rey re-emerges, Finn hands her the wrench.
BB-8 said the location of the Resistance Base is "need to know" -- if I'm taking you there, I need to know!
(Throws a tool) This? She catches it and goes under again, leaving Finn and BB- alone. He contemplates telling her the truth. This is his moment. But instead he knees to BB-8, says quietly, urgen
You gotta tell us where the base is.

I don't speak that. Alright, between us, I'm not with the Resistance, okay? (BB-8 backs up) -- I'm just trying to get away from the First Order -- but you tell us where your base is, I'll get there first -- deal?! (BB-8 COCKS his head) Droid, please. Rey pops up again:
Pilex driver, hurry! Finn moves for the tool.
So where's your base?
(searching, to BB-8) Go on BB-8, tell her.
Please! She and Finn look to BB-8 -- who considers the whole situation, then BEEPS.
The Ileenium system? Finn hands her the tool, surprised but thrilled -- Rey disappears below again.
Yeah, the Ileenium system, that's the one -- get us there as fast as you can. A smiling Finn gives BB-8 a THUMBS UP. BB-8 quickly exten his WELDING TORCH and TURNS IT UPWARD, then retracts it.
I'll drop you two at Ponemah Terminal. I need the bonding tape, hurry!
(searching for tape) What about you?
I gotta get back to Jakku!
(loses his mind) BACK TO JAK--?! Why does everyone always wanna go back to Jakku?! !

No, that one! No. No. The one I'm pointing to! No. NO. NO. If we don't patch it up, the propulsion tank will overflow and flood the ship with poisonous gas! Bb-8 has moved to Finn -- TIPS HIS HEAD, shows him the to He throws her the tape, she disappears below:
This?
Yes!
Hey. Rey. You're a pilot -- you can fly anywhere! Why go back?! You got a family? You got a boyfriend? Cute boyfriend? The STEAM and ALARM STOP as Rey pops up, annoyed:
None of your business, THAT'S WHY! But then: ALL THE SHIP POWER GOES OUT. BB-8 is nervous.
... That can't be good.
-- No it can't be --
They plop into the seats, in a panic. She checks the dead
Someone's locked onto us -- all controls are overridden. Finn quickly, awkwardly climbs up, looks out.
Get off. Get off! See anything?
... Oh no.
The Millennium Falcon, powerless, is a sitting duck. SOMETHING EPIC appears from ABOVE: THE ANTENNA ARRAY IS T

head_text.subj: FIRST WE SEE OF A MASSIVE FREIGHTER, ITS GIANT HANGAR OPE
LIKE A HUGE MOUTH WHICH SWALLOWS THE FALCON LIKE A WHALE

text: Finn PLOPS into his seat, horrified.
It's the First Order.
What do we do-- there must be
Finn's mind races -- then:
You said poisonous gas --
-- Yeah, but I fixed that --
Can you unfix it? Rey stares at him -- and gets his plan! They head off --
The GAS MASKS hanging in the lounge are GRABBED.
Finn and Rey, gas masks on, quickly climb into the open grating area.
C'mon BB-8. They help BB-8 down, too: they both struggle like crazy, weighs a TON.
I got it.
Oooh...
I'm okay. BB-8 get off me...
Finn pulls the grating over them as Rey works on the cont
You think this'll work on the Stormtroopers?
Yeah. Their masks filter out smoke, not toxins. LIGHTS COME ON! SOUND of the SHIP RAMP LOWERING! Finn PUL THE GRATING CLOSED as he says:
Hurry!
I'm hurrying! Suddenly the FALCON DOOR OPENS -- AND HAN SOLO AND CHEWBA BOARD THE FALCON, weapons at the ready. PUSH IN ON THEM, ready for combat, operating silently, with hand signals o

Chewie, we're home. Han gives Chewie a nod to check out the ship. Chewie head off one way, Han in another. The grating above LIFTS OFF -- hands in surrender, they l up at Han, who's training his blaster on them, threatenin They're SCARED.
Where are the others? Where's the pilot?
...I'm the pilot...
You? Chewie MOAN-TALKS. Rey responds to him --
No, it's true: we're the only ones on board.
You can understand that thing?
And "that thing" can understand you too, so watch it. Come on outta there. They climb up -- BB-8 uses his magnetic arm to quickly pu himself out.
Where'd you get this ship?
Niima Outpost.
Jakku?! That junkyard?
Thank you! Junkyard!
Told ya we should've double-checked the Western Reaches!
Who had it, Ducain?
I stole it from Unkar Plutt. He stole it from the Irving Boys, who stole it from Ducain.

Who stole it from me! Well, you tell him Han Solo just stole back the Millennium Falcon for good. Han walks away, takes in the ship: it's his again. Doesn' see that Rey is awed. His back to all of them, he smiles. Chewie responds as Han heads toward the cockpit.
This is the Millennium Falcon? You're Han Solo?
I used to be.
Han Solo? The Rebellion General?
No, the smuggler!
Wasn't he a war hero?! Chewie replies: "Yeah, I guess, kinda..." Rey calls out:
This is the ship that made the Kessel Run in fourteen parsecs...!
Han enters the cockpit.
Twelve! Fourteen. A moment of private joy. Then he sees something that ANNO
Hey! Some moof-milker put a compressor on the ignition line! Han moves to the corridor.
Unkar Plutt did. I thought it was a mistake too, puts too much stress on
-- Stress on the hyperdrive-- (who is she? Then:) Chewie, throw 'em in a pod, we'll drop them at the nearest inhabited planet.
Wait! No -- we need your help!
My help?
This droid has to get to the Resistance base as soon as possible!
He's carrying a map to Luke Skywalker. Yup: Han stops in his tracks.
You are the Han Solo that fought with the Rebellion. You knew him. The mention of Luke has really hit Han. He turns to Finn.
Yeah, I knew him. I knew Luke. Suddenly: a distant, METALLIC KA-CHUNK!
Don't tell me a Rathtar's gotten
Han hurries out -- they all follow, (Chewie, Rey, Finn, t BB-8), Finn with WILD CONCERN:
Wait -- a what?! Did you just say Rathtars? Hey!
The Falcon is parked in this giant freighter's hangar. Ha moves to a CONTROL PANEL, they all follow him.
You're not hauling Rathtars on this freighter, are you?
I'm hauling Rathtars. On the CONTROL PANEL: IMAGES ON SCREENS FROM ALL AROUND T SHIP. Including the EXTERIOR, where a TRANSPORT SHIP is LANDING ON THE FREIGHTER. Han is fearful.
Oh great. It's the Guavian Death Gang -- they must've tracked us from Nantoon. Han heads off as:
What's a Rathtar?
Han leads our group down a LONG NARROW HALL lined with ca containers.
They're big and dangerous...
Y'ever heard of the Trillia Massacre?!
No.
Good. They turn a corner:
I got three of 'em going to King Prana.
THREE?! How'd you get them on board?
I used to have a bigger crew. Chewie GROAN-TALKS, concurring.
Get below deck and stay there until I say so -- don't even think about taking the Falcon.
What about BB-8?
He stays with me -- until I get rid of the gang, then you can have him back and be on your way.
What about the Rathtars... where are you keeping them? A TERRIFYING BAM: a GROTESQUE RATHTAR GIANT TONGUE SLAMS into the CARGO CONTAINER window behind Finn, whose heart stops.
There's one.
What are you gonna do?
Same thing I always do: talk my way out of it.
Yes, I do. Every time.

A PORTAL opens. The GUAVIAN DEATH GANG enters. One man in a SUIT (BALA-TIK), and five SECURITY SOLDIERS in badass UNIFORMS with ROUND-FACE HELMETS. They turn into and stop at one end of the corridor. Han, Chewie and BB-8 forty fe away in the middle of the long hall.
Han Solo. You are a dead man. Han smiles innocently, friendly. BB-8 nervously looks bac and forth at the gang, and Han.
Bala-Tik. What's the problem?
The problem is we loaned you fifty thousand for this job.
They look up, trying to get a view.
Can you see them?
No. They start crawling down the crawl space.
I heard you also borrowed fifty thousand from Kanjiklub.
You know you can't trust those little freaks! How long've we known each other? Rey and Finn arrive under the gang. They WHISPER:
They have blasters...
A lot of 'em. We RISE THROUGH THE FLOOR to see the GANG and Han and com in the distance.
The question is how much longer will we know each other? Not long. We want our money back now.
Ya think hunting Rathtars is cheap? I spent that money.
Kanjiklub wants their investment back, too.
I never made a deal with Kanjiklub!

Tell that to Kanjiklub. The SOUND of a PORTAL OPENING. Han's face GOES WHITE as h turns to the OTHER END OF THE CORRIDOR, where KANJIKLUB MEMBERS APPEAR. A GANG in a MEDIEVAL BANDITO style. Han smiles uncomfortably at the Kanjiklub members. Its LEADER, TASU LEECH, out front. Han tries to play it off:
Tasu Leech. Good to see you. Tasu speaks an alien language, we SUBTITLE:
Wrong again, Solo. It's over for you. Tasu COCKS HIS WEAPON, there for blood. BB-8 is nervous. Finn and Rey react to the sounds of the new gang -- start CRAWLING BACK the other way to see them.
Boys. You're both gonna get what I promised! Have I ever not delivered for you before?
Yeah.
Twice! Han realizes he's right.
What was the second time?
Your game is old. There's no one in the galaxy left for you to swindle.
Nowhere left for you to hide.

That BB unit... the First Order is looking for one just like it. And two fugitives. Finn and Rey SUDDENLY STOP CRAWLING, tense. BB-8 hides behind Han's leg. PUSH IN ON Han as he realize Finn and Rey are in real trouble.
First I've heard of it. Below the grating, Finn and Rey look at each other, afrai Above, another Kanjiklubber (RAZOO QIN-FEE) says (SUBTITL

Search the freighter. One of the Kanjiklubbers begins moving down the corridor, AIMING A FLASHLIGHT DOWN BELOW, searching for: FINN AND REY, in a QUIET PANIC BELOW: THEY START CRAWLING FAST in the opposite direction they came. Rey crawls off fast, Finn follows. They quickly arrive at a JUNCTION BOX AREA, Rey looking at the controls.
Wait wait wait wait. If we close the blast doors in that corridor, we can trap both gangs!
Close the blast doors from here?

Resetting the fuses should do it. Rey begins RESETTING the FUSES, SPARKS shooting from them they do. Finn quickly joins in. Rey and Finn FINISH resetting the fuses boxes. Rey smiles optimistically. Finn looks hopeful too. DOWN AN EMPTY ROW OF LARGE CONTAINERS, which OPEN -- and GIANT RATHTAR -- an ENORMOUS, FIERCE AND RAVENOUS LAND OC
BACK UP TOP as BANKS OF LIGHTS BEGIN GOING OFF, ONE BY ON The GANGS look around. Han's eyes go wide -- he gets it -- and it's bad. QUIETLY
... I got a bad feeling about this... Suddenly all the LIGHTS COME ON AGAIN -- even down below, where Rey realizes it hasn't gone as planned.
Oh no.
Oh no, what?
Wrong fuses.

head_text.subj: IN ANOTHER CORRIDOR, BACK WITH THE GANGS

text: Kill them! And take the droid! The gangs AIM THEIR WEAPONS JUST AS A RATHTAR APPEARS BEH

head_text.subj: THE GUAVIAN DEATH GANG, GRABBING TWO MEMBERS

text: SCREAM AND RUN! The gang FIRES BACK -- BLASTS FLY! Han and Chewie react, flinching -- then turn to Kanjiklub a RATHTAR APPEARS BEHIND THEM, ROARING DEAFENINGLY! The Gang turns -- others run, FIRE AT IT.
Han, Chewie and BB-8 race down the hall -- A MEMBER OF TH KANJIKLUB GANG comes around the corner. Han PUNCHES him with one blow, throws him toward the Rathtar. They keep steppin....
Rey and Finn hurriedly crawl through the space below deck
This was a mistake!
Huge!

Two Guavian Death Gang members run through the ship -- pa Tasu Leech, who sees another Kanjiklub member down the corridor -- who gets GRABBED BY A TENTACLE! Tasu tries to help him, but he gets PULLED UP AND AWAY! Tasu hears a distant terror-scream of a Rathtar, and runs the other wa Other Kanjiklub members YELL at him to avoid that directi they all turn a corner -- a RATHTAR IS THERE AND GRABS TH TWO OTHERS! Tasu FIRES at the beast and RUNS OFF -- and w land on a FLOOR HATCH, which opens. Rey and Finn climb ou quickly.
They turn a corridor --
What do they look like?
Another corner -- and GANG MEMBERS ARE BATTLING A HORRIBL RATHTAR! Rey COVERS HER MOUTH.
They look like that. Finn yanks her away. They race around another corner -- a
This way!
Are you sure? They scream and run off -- but Finn is GRABBED, PULLED AW
But the Rathtar's fast and TURNS A CORNER, losing Rey --
TIGHT ON FINN as he's being yanked down the hall, SCREAMI as he struggles to get loose! Rey turns the corner -- Finn is gone -- nowhere to be see

Without Finn, she is instantly distraught -- then she realizes: SHE'S JUST PASSED A CONTROL PANEL! Her eyes lig up as she moves to it: a BANK OF VIDEO MONITORS OF THE SH and there's Finn, being dragged by a Rathtar toward an OP BLAST DOOR. Rey's hand on the button, she waits... then

The BLAST DOOR INSTANTLY CLOSES ON ONE OF THE RATHTAR'S TENTACLES! It SCREAMS IN PAIN, ITS SEVERED TENTACLE STILL WRAPPED AROUND FINN'S LEG! Finn scrambles up, desperately shaking the sticky tentacle off his leg! Rey arrives, runs to Finn, beaming to see him alive -- he adrenaline-rushed, in shock:
Finn!
It had me! But the door--!
That was lucky! ANOTHER CORRIDOR - Finn and Rey run towards the Falcon.
Han, Chewie and BB-8 take cover, Han exchanging BLASTER F with GANG MEMBERS AT THE OTHER END OF THE HALL.

I got the door. Cover us! Chewie GROAN-AGREES. Chewie FIRES DOWN THE HALL as Han CROSSES THE CORRIDOR, BB-8 following nervously. As Chewie exchanges blaster fire, Han works the controls. THE HATCH OPENS (FALCON in the distance) -- just as CHEWI IS HIT IN THE SHOULDER BY ENEMY FIRE! He goes down with a
Chewie! You okay? Han GRABS CHEWIE'S BOWCASTER, FIRES at the DOOR CONTROLS,
(looks at bowcaster) Wow. Come on! Come on!
Run with Finn and Rey as they turn into the hangar, towar the Falcon. Han helps WOUNDED CHEWIE up the ramp, sees th
Han! Finn and Rey race past BB-8 -- as they go up the ramp, Ha says to Rey:
You, close the door behind us!
You take care of Chewie! Han and Rey race up the ramp as Finn heads up with Chewie who SCREAMS WILDLY IN PAIN!
Han stands at the navicomputer, hitting switches. Rey ent fast, moves past him to Chewie's seat.
Hey, where are you going?
Unkar Plutt installed a fuel pump too -- if we don't prime that we're not going anywhere.
I hate that guy. Han sits as, Rey hitting buttons:
And you could use a co-pilot.
I got one, he's back there.

head_text.subj: IN THE LOUNGE, CHEWIE IS IN PAIN --

text: Han and Rey in the seats:
Watch the thrust, we're goin' out of here at lightspeed --
From inside the hangar? Is that even possible?
I never ask that question until after I've done it. A RATHTAR JUMPS ONTO THE WINDSHIELD -- REY SCREAMS! Its GIANT MOUTH CHEWING AT THE GLASS! Han works the controls:
This is not how I thought this day was gonna go -- angle the shields -- Hang on back there! IN THE LOUNGE, Chewie is in pain -- Finn going through a first aid kit -- the ship is HIT again --
No problem!
Three GANG MEMBERS race out here and FIRE AT THE FALCON - hitting FUEL LINES, BLASTING THE SHIP HARD! The ship is hit.
Come on baby, don't let me down! He hits a switch -- but NOTHING.
What?! But Rey reaches over, hits a switch, matter-of-factly.

Compressor. Han doesn't like it but she's right -- he hits the switch again and the HYPERDRIVE FIRES! The hangar is FILLED WITH LIGHTSPEED BLAST as the ATTACKING GANG MEMBERS ARE BLASTE BACK LIKE DRY LEAVES. In the cockpit the RATHTAR RIPS AWA as THE STARS STRETCH LIKE ELASTIC and we CUT TO:
Camera ROTATES as the Falcon DISAPPEARS IN A STREAK, leav the cargo ship behind.
PUSH IN on a HANGAR DOOR where Bala-Tik arrives at the wi SEETHING. Makes a CALL:
Inform the First Order that Han Solo has the droid they want. And it's aboard the Millennium Falcon.

A pair of TIE fighters roar towards a magnificent PLANET, frozen WHITE. This is the STARKILLER BASE, a natural plan that has been hacked and modified into something sinister Over this we HEAR a DEEP, almost SOOTHING VOICE. A voice very much in control, of power:
The droid will soon be delivered to the Resistance...

KYLO REN and General Hux in a dark space, looking UPWARD someone addressing them. We're in a massive and dark ASSEMBLY ROOM. Hundreds of DE in a stadium arc, focused on a platform where we see SUPR LEADER SNOKE. Not entirely human, at nearly twenty-five feet tall. All of him a STONY GREY. Old, wounded, fragile and powerful, all at the same time.
... Leading them to the last Jedi. If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise.
Supreme Leader, I take full responsibility for th--
General! Our strategy must now change.

The weapon. It is ready. I believe the time has come to use it. We shall destroy the government that supports the Resistance, the Republic. Without their friends to protect them, the Resistance will be vulnerable, and we will stop them before they reach Skywalker. Snoke considers. Almost seems to die for a moment. Then:
Go. Oversee preparations.
Yes, Supreme Leader. General Hux, proud, cocksure, exits. Kylo Ren watches him go. Snoke SITS. A new intimacy in his voice.
There's been an awakening. Have you felt it?
Yes.
There's something more. The droid we seek is aboard the Millennium Falcon. In the hands of your father, Han Solo. Kylo Ren reacts with subtle, but real, surprise.
He means nothing to me.
Even you, master of the Knights of Ren, have never faced such a test.
By the grace of your training, I will not be seduced.

We shall see. We shall see. A gentle, satisfied nod from Snoke, and Kylo Ren, obsesse filled up, exits. Snoke watches him disappear, a grotesqu evil SMILE growing -- as he DISINTEGRATES -- Snoke has be a HOLOGRAM all along.
RACING with the Falcon through the STRINGLIGHT of lightsp
CHAOS: INTERCUT between the COCKPIT where Han and Rey pil ALARMS SOUNDING, problems everywhere, and the LOUNGE wher CHEWIE YELPS as Finn nervously works to BANDAGE HIS SHOUL
Electrical overload!
I can fix that!
The coolant's leaking!
Try transferring auxiliary power to the secondary tank--
-- Secondary tank, I got it!
CHEWIE HOWLS IN PAIN! Finn hangs in there, wraps a bandag on Chewie's shoulder: Chewie ROARS. BB-8 scurries off.
Chewie, come on! I need help with this giant hairy thing! Stop moving! Chewie!
You hurt Chewie, you're gonna deal with me!
As Finn struggles to bandage the Wookiee:
Hurt him?! He almost killed me six times! (Chewie GRABS HIM by the collar, ROARS) Which is fine.
This hyperdrive blows there's gonna be pieces of us in three different systems. Han at the controls when all the alarms STOP. Rey, satisf sits in the co-pilot seat. Han is confused.
What'd you do?
I by-passed the compressor. He looks at her. A little, appreciative laugh. Han exits, walking past BB-8.
Move, Ball.
Han kneels at Chewie, who lies awake but recovering. Han checks his friend's wound with care. Chewie MOAN-TALKS.
Nah, don't say that, you did great. Just rest. Han turns to Finn, who sits at the HOLOCHESS set, BB-8 be him. This is awkward for Han, but damn, he means it:
Good job, kid. And thanks.
You're welcome. Finn has accidentally hit a button on the chess set, and PIECES appear, looking up at Finn, curiously. The pieces start to FIGHT as Finn fiddles with the controls, trying turn it off.
So, fugitives, huh?
The First Order wants the map.
(re: Finn and BB-8) Finn is with the Resistance...
... I'm just a scavenger. Han gives Finn a skeptical once-over as Finn finally mana to TURN THE CHESS SET OFF as Rey enters. Han looks to BB-
Let's see whatcha got.

Go ahead. BB-8 rolls forward -- and suddenly PROJECTS A HOLOGRAPHIC MAP, FILLING THE ROOM. PLANETS, STARS, SYSTEMS. They all react. Chewie sits to look up. Han moves through stars, becomes reflective.
This map's not complete. It's just a piece. Ever since Luke disappeared, people have been looking for him.
Why'd he leave?
He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice turned against him, destroyed it all. Luke felt responsible... He walked away from everything.
Do you know what happened to him?
There're a lot of rumors. Stories. The people who knew him the best think he went looking for the first Jedi temple.
The Jedi were real?
I used to wonder that myself. Thought it was a bunch of mumbo-jumbo -- magical power holding together good, evil, the dark side and the light.
'Crazy thing is, it's true. The Force, the Jedi, all of it. It's all true.
An alarm rings on the control station, prompting Han to t some switches. BB-8 cuts off the hologram. Chewie rises and moans to Han, but Han motions for Chewie to lay back
No, you rest. (To Rey and Finn) You want my help? You're getting it. Gonna see an old friend. She'll get your droid home. This is our stop. Han leaves towards the cockpit, Rey and Finn following.
BEHIND THE FALCON as it DROPS OUT OF LIGHTSPEED, revealin BEAUTIFUL GREEN PLANET ahead, TAKODANA.
Han pilots. Finn and BB-8 beside him, Rey as co-pilot. Han notices Rey looking out the windshield, almost in tea
... I didn't know there was this much green in the whole galaxy... Han watches her -- sees a vulnerability that touches him.
The Falcon CRESTS OVER an ENDLESS GREEN FOREST TO REVEAL CASTLE on a picturesque LAKE. The Falcon lands near the castle, among dozens of WORN, smallish freighters.
Rey steps off the Falcon, UP TO CAMERA, BB-8 at her side. She takes in the towering stone CASTLE, FOREST to one sid LAKE to the other. Serene, beautiful, all new to her.
From BLACKNESS: a storage unit opens. Han rummages, retrieving old BLASTERS. Finn arrives behind him, concern
Hey, Solo -- I'm not sure what we're walking into here --
D'you just call me "Solo"?
Sorry. Han-- Mr. Solo. You should know, I'm a big deal in the Resistance. Which puts a real target on my back. Are there any conspirators here? First Order sympathizers?
Listen big deal, you've got another problem. Women always figure out the truth. Hands him a BLASTER.
Always. Han walks off. Finn watches him go, wracked with guilt.
Han hands Rey a blaster pistol as she stands at looks at castle.
You might need this.
I think I can handle myself.
I know you do. That's why I'm giving it to you. Take it. Rey picks it up. Grips it.
You know how to use one of these?
Yeah, you pull the trigger.
There's a little bit more to it than that. You got a lot to learn. You got a name?
Rey.
Rey. I've been thinkin' about bringing on some more crew, Rey. A second mate. Someone to help out. Someone who can keep up with Chewie and me, appreciates the Falcon.
Are you offering me a job?
I wouldn't be nice to you. It doesn't pay much.
You're offering me a job.
I'm thinking about it. Rey wants to say yes. But something stops her. A line she can't cross.
Well?
If you were, I'd be flattered. But I have to get home. Han looks at her, questioningly.
Jakku? Rey looks off, in thought. Yeah, Jakku.
I've already been away too long.
Chewie, check out the ship as best you can.
It's too bad. Chewie kind of likes you. Han heads off. HOLD on Rey.
Han walks them to the castle.
Solo, why are we here again?
To get your droid on a clean ship.
Clean?
Do you think it was luck that Chewie and I found the Falcon? If we can find it on our scanners, the First Order's not far behind. Want to get BB-8 to the Resistance? Maz Kanata is our best bet.
We can trust her, right?
Relax, kid. She's run this watering hole for a thousand years. Maz is a bit of an acquired taste, so let me do the talking. And whatever you do, don't stare...
At what?
Any of it. The door opens. Music. Madness. And...

We ENTER THE LOUD, CROWDED MESS of a hall -- PUSHING PAST room full of rough and odd ALIENS AND HUMANS, who gamble, drink, scheme, negotiate, argue -- until we end up on the BACK of a tiny, thousand year-old, four foot tall ALIEN, suddenly STARTS, as if SENSING something -- the Alien TUR TO US: she is FEMALE, wearing large ADJUSTABLE GOGGLES. This is MAZ KANATA.
Han Solo! Everyone turns to look. It's ALL QUIET in here.
(Sotto) Oh boy. (Louder, waving) Hey, Maz! NOISE returns. Maz walks to them, pushes someone away.
Where's my boyfriend?
Chewie's working on the Falcon.
I like that Wookiee. I assume you need something. Desperately. Let's get to it.

Maz walks off, gesturing for them to follow. Finn and Rey are confused. Han indicates for them to follow. They do - passing the enormous GRUMMGAR, who sits with vixen BAZINE NETAL, who watches them suspiciously. A SMALL DROID (GA-97), who turns its head to see BB-8 following Rey across the room. GA-97, now animated, makes small TRANSMITTING SOUND, which is subtitled.
Alert the Resistance. Their missing droid is here! And we CUT TO:
Bazine enters a shadowy space, stealthily makes a call on communicator. Clearly, BAZINE IS A SPY. Subtitled:
Inform the First Order... I've found the droid.
A massive Star Destroyer hovers over the hacked ice plane
A dark space. Kylo Ren, CLOSE TO CAMERA, addresses someon OFF-CAMERA whom we do not see.

Forgive me. I feel it again. The pull to the light. Supreme Leader senses it. Show me again, the power of the darkness, and I will let nothing stand in our way. Show me, Grandfather, and I will finish what you started. As his emotion builds, he stands and heads off -- we FOLL HIM, PIVOTING TO REVEAL who he was talking to: THE BURNT, ASHEN, GHOSTLY DEFORMED MASK OF DARTH VADER.
Maz is putting together some FOOD as she says:
A map to Skywalker himself? You're right back in the mess.
Maz, I need you to get this droid to Leia.
Hmm. No. You've been running away from this fight for too long. Han, nyakee nago wadda. Go home!
Leia doesn't want to see me.
Please, we came here for your help.
What fight?

The only fight: against the dark side. Through the ages, I've seen evil take many forms. The Sith. The Empire. Today, it is the First Order. Their shadow is spreading across the galaxy. We must face them. Fight them. All of us.

There is no fight against the First Order! Not one we can win. Look around. There's no chance we haven't been recognized already. I bet you the First Order is on their way right-- Finn stops, seeing Maz adjusting her goggles, scrutinizin him -- her eyes get HUGE.

What's this? What are you doing? Maz adjusts the goggles again. Her eyes get impossibly BIGGER. She grunts recognition. She hoists herself on the tabletop, knocking over food and plates, crawling towards Finn.
Solo, what is she doing?
I don't know, but it ain't good.
If you live long enough you see the same eyes in different people. I'm looking at the eyes of a man who wants to run.
(eyes on Maz) You don't know a thing about me. Where I'm from. What I've seen.
You don't know the First Order like I do. They'll slaughter us. We all need to run. Rey is stunned. Maz, not so much. She crawls back to her chair. She points to some pirates in the corner.
You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear. Finn sees them. Considers.
Finn!
Come with me.
What about BB-8? We're not done yet. We have to get him back to your base.
I can't. Finn stands to leave. He offers the gun back to Han.
Keep it, kid. Finn heads off. Rey gets up to follow. Maz dials her lens back to normal, and turns to Han.
Who's the girl?
Who has arrived at the table with the ALIEN SMUGGLERS.
I was told you could get me to the Outer Rim. Rey barges into the conversation, interrupting.
What are you doing? Finn gets up to talk to her.
(to Big Head) Don't leave without me.
Embarrassed, Finn moves her away.
You can't just go. I won't let you.
I'm not who you think I am.
Finn, what are you talking about?
I'm not Resistance. I'm not a hero. I'm a Stormtrooper.
Like all of them, I was taken from a family I'll never know. And raised to do one thing...
But my first battle, I made a choice. I wasn't going to kill for them. So I ran.
Right into you. And you looked at me like no one ever had. I was ashamed of what I was. But I'm done with the First Order. I'm never going back. Rey, come with me.
Don't go.

Take care of yourself. Please. Rey looks at him, crushed. With quiet resignation, Rey watches Finn return to the aliens... And all three head off. He gets to the front door and wal through it. Rey is heartsick, but she turns as she hears the sound of young girl in anguish, crying. She follows the sound into the castle, turning so she can't see that Finn has looked back at her one last time.

Rey steps down into the basement corridor. BB-8 follows her. Walking carefully and confused, she is not sure why she's down here. She can hear the echoing sounds of a you girl crying. She heads down the hall... to the very end, where there is a door. It is almost as if a SOULFUL VIBRA draws her closer. She looks at the door lock -- AND THE DOOR OPENS. Hesitant, Rey enters.

Rey moves into the dark, small, vaulted storage room. Old treasures line the floors and walls, but there is somethi specific Rey is drawn to: on a table, an old wooden BOX. She moves to it, unsure, afraid, as if an energy from ins the box has been calling her here. BB-8 nervously follows Rey reaches out, very slowly, to touch the box. A moment heavy with tension. Rey OPENS THE BOX and sees inside Luke Skywalker's origin lightsaber. With hesitation, she reaches towards it, but she cannot resist. As her hand makes contact with it, the is the piercing sound of a lightsaber igniting. She moves her hand away, as REY HEARS A MECHANICAL BREATHING sound. The CAMERA MOVES, LIGHTING CHANGES -- and we see behind h something impossible: a HALLWAY OF FROM DEEP INSIDE CLOUD CITY. Disembodied voices fill the air.

She stands -- looks around, confused by all she sees and hears. -- Turns and sees, through a DOORWAY. We follow Rey and she runs down the corridor, but it all TILTS -- TURNS -- and she lands on the WALL -- which is now the GROUND -- dried GRASS. She turns to look -- we PIVOT -- and see a BURNING TEMPLE NIGHT. We PAN to: R2-D2 -- who watches the flames -- and a MAN appears (LUK whose face we do not see). He falls to his knees, reaches out to the droid -- with a MECHANICAL RIGHT HAND. We PUSH IN ON REY as RAIN BEGINS -- and DAY TURNS TO NIGH and she LOOKS UP -- we TILT UP -- To see we're LOOKING UP AT A WARRIOR as he is STABBED BY FIERY LIGHTSABER! He screams and falls to the ground -- w FOLLOW HIM, revealing Rey again, now in a nighttime battlefield. She gets to her feet, frightened by what she sees. We PIVOT AROUND HER to REVEAL KYLO REN, and the six other KNIGHTS OF REN, who flank him! Come back around to Rey, soaking now, as the RAIN STOPS a SUNLIGHT illuminates her -- she turns to look -- we PIVOT and see... A little girl. Rey as a child. She is sobbing, hysterical Unkar Plutt's meaty hand holds her thin arm. She is on Ja watching a starship fly into the sky, abandoning her.
No, come back!

Quiet, girl! The ship flies towards the desert sun, which is strangely eclipsed, as if being eaten by darkness. Rey looks around her to see she is.. In a NIGHTTIME, BARREN, SNOWY WOODS. She's losing her min confounded and lost and she gets to her feet, her breath seen in the frigid air -- and then: THE SOUND OF CLASHING LIGHTSABERS! She moves through the woods, toward the soun Rey runs, heart pounding, when KYLO REN EMERGES FROM BEHI A TREE! She stops, SCREAMS, FALLS BACK and LANDS IN:

She falls back, out of the room, suddenly sitting in the hall, out of breath, alarmed and perplexed. She HEARS something and turns to look. Maz stands at the end of the corridor, realizing what has just happened.
What was that? I shouldn't have gone in there.
That lightsaber was Luke's. And his father's before him and now, it calls to you! Rey stands, fast. Still overwhelmed, emotional, speechles
I have to get back to Jakku.
Han told me. (reaches out, hold
Dear child. I see your eyes. You already know the truth. Whomever you're waiting for on Jakku, they're never coming back. But... there's someone who still could.
Luke.
The belonging you seek is not behind you. It is ahead. I am no Jedi, but I know the Force. It moves through and surrounds every living thing. Close your eyes. Feel it.
The light. It's always been there. It will guide you. The saber. Take it. Rey suddenly stands.

I'm never touching that again. I don't want any part of this. And Rey runs off, passing Maz. Rey's mind is spinning -- she can't take it -- she turns heads off, fast. BB-8 follows her. TIGHT ON MAZ, watching her go. Maz SIGHS, feeling for the young girl.
Rey exits the castle, needs to run, but doesn't know wher Heads toward the woods.
Rey moves through the foliage, heart racing. Over this, w HEAR a RUMBLING -- intense, an OMEN of something horrible come.

A massive rally: a thousand STORMTROOPERS, TIE FIGHTERS, OFFICERS and VEHICLES. BRUTALIST STRUCTURES, mountainous SNOWY LANDSCAPE. Addressing them at a podium, flanked by RED FIRST ORDER BANNERS, is HUX. His voice ECHOES:

Today is the end of the Republic! The end of a regime that acquiesces to disorder! At this very moment, in a system far from here the New Republic LIES to the GALAXY while secretly supporting the treachery of the loathsome Resistance. This fierce machine which you have built, upon which we stand, will bring an end to the Senate! To their cherished fleet! All remaining systems will bow to the First Order! And will remember this... as the last day of the Republic!
ENGINEERS perform FINAL FIRING PROTOCOL. There's a sense nervousness -- WILL THIS MASSIVE WEAPON ACTUALLY WORK?
And Hux TURNS to give the signal as we CUT BACK WIDE -- a ROAR OF BOOTS ON PAVEMENT as the thousand Stormtroopers T to face an endless snowy landscape. WHAT IS ABOUT TO HAPP
A view PAST THE RALLY. For a moment, nothing. Then, eeril

head_text.subj: SILENT, AN IMPOSSIBLE BLAST OF FIRE LIGHT

text: THE SKY! Seconds later, a TERRIBLE EXPLOSIVE ROAR! The Troopers -- everyone -- is nearly PUSHED BACK by the FORCE of it -- the magnitude! Many have to COVER THEIR EY For MILES around the FIREBEAM, ICE AND SNOW MELTS INSTANT Runoff tunnels FLOODED with AN OCEAN OF FRESH WATER. AIRB CREATURES by the thousands burst from trees and take flig Hux watches, his eyes WILD WITH POWER AND EVIL. From HIS eyes, CUT TO:
TIGHT ON KYLO REN as he watches the Starkiller firing.
Finn boards the Alien Freighter. The SOUND FROM THE SKY makes him turn back. He sees the PATH OF FIRE and his blo runs cold, his heart sinks.
At a massive distance we see PLANETS THE REPUBLIC CAPITAL

The galaxy CENTER OF GOVERNMENT at NIGHT. Impressive structures. Senators and dignitaries look in uncomprehend horror to the night sky. LIGHT GROWING -- FROM A GREAT DISTANCE a CIRCLE OF FIRE -- LIKE A SMALL SU
NIGHT TO DAY! And in seconds THE FIRE BLOCKS OUT EVERYTHI

head_text.subj: ELSE, AND THE ENTIRE PLANET OF HOSNIAN PRIME IS INCINERAT

text: A crowd of ALIENS files out from inside, all eyes on the FIRE IN THE SKY. Dozens of LANGUAGES exclaiming fear and horror. Find Han and Chewie moving out, looking up.
It was the Republic. Han and Chewie turn as Finn arrives, moving quickly throu the crowd. With dread:
The First Order, they've done it. Where's Rey?

Rey races through the forest and finally comes to a stop, overwhelmed and exhausted. At an emotional breaking point she has no idea where to go, who to turn to. Then she HEA A BEEP -- turns to see BB-8, catching up with her.
What are you doing?
You have to go back. (he BEEPS again)

BB-8. No, you can't -- you have to go back, you're too important. They'll help you. Then, ANOTHER SOUND -- LOUDER NOW -- they LOOK UP AGAIN: front of the system attack, A FLEET OF FIRST ORDER SHIPS ROAR OVERHEAD, TOWARD THE CASTLE! Rey's heart sinks: HER
Maz leads Han, Finn and Chewie down the hall, fast:
I've had this for ages...
Maz opens the box -- holds out the lightsaber to Finn:
Kept it locked away.
Where'd you get that?
A good question for another time.
Take it! Find your friend! Finn grabs it as the room is SHAKEN by an above ground at
Those beasts! They're here!
Rey and BB-8 race fast back toward the castle -- EXPLOSIO SOUNDS can be HEARD from the direction they're headed!

Rey races through the trees -- sees Maz' castle -- BEING DESTROYED BY FIRST ORDER SHIPS! Aliens RUNNING, GETTING OBLITERATED by SCREAMING TIE FIGHTERS! Other TIE FIGHTERS and TRANSPORTERS LAND, STORMTROOPERS in attack. Just then, filtered RADIO CALLS get Rey's attention: near STORMTROOPERS have spotted her, AND FIRE!
FN-417, hold position! Rey takes cover, grabs her BLASTER -- but IT WON'T FIRE! She panics, then realizes:
Safety! SHE SWITCHES OFF THE SAFETY and FIRES BACK! HITS TWO TROO and retreats, calls to BB-8: BB-8 follows Rey AWAY FROM THE CASTLE, firing back at mor chasing Troopers!
Kylo Ren moves through the DEBRIS. A Stormtrooper approac
Sir, the droid was spotted heading west, with a girl. Kylo Ren LOOKS BACK SHARPLY, in Rey's direction --
Rey and BB-8 move swiftly, terrified -- she stops them:

You have to keep going, stay out of sight, I'll try to fight 'em off. (BB-8 BEEPS; bravely through her fear) I hope so, too. BB-8 BEEPS and heads off -- Rey RUNS and TAKES COVER behi a massive, mossy tree. TIGHT on her TERRIFIED FACE --
Han, Chewie, Finn and Maz, exhausted, CLIMB UP, peek thro debris.
Come on, Chewie! Maz turns to Finn:
Rey and BB-8, they need you. Now go.
I need a weapon. Maz grabs his wrist -- holds up his hand -- THE SABER.
You have one! He looks at her questioningly -- he's supposed to use the lightsaber?! He TURNS IT ON. HAN AND CHEWIE RUN, TAKE COVER from BLASTS, FIRING BACK a Stormtroopers, taking some out!
Hey, can I try that? Han borrows Chewbacca's bowcaster, fires on Stormtroopers and sends them flying.
I like this thing. FINN SURPRISES A STORMTROOPER WITH THE LIGHTSABER, then another! Untrained, he's athletic, brave, impressive. One Stormtrooper has a MACE --

Traitor! FINN and the TROOPER WITH THE MACE battle. The Mace Troop KNOCKS FINN DOWN! The Stormtrooper is about to end him, when THE STORMTROOPER IS SHOT AND FALLS! Wide-eyed Finn sees Han run over, having fired the blast! Han helps him up.
You okay, Big deal?
Thanks! But TEN STORMTROOPERS come over a RISE, BLASTERS AIMED.
Don't move! TK-338, we have targets in custody!

No way out, they DROP THEIR WEAPONS: TIGHT on the LIGHTSA as it HITS THE GROUND. A STORMTROOPER HAND picks it up. Han's MIND RACES as a SQUAD OF TROOPERS appears behind th Finn, Han and Chewie are MARCHED by Stormtroopers back to a transport, hands on their heads. But then -- A FAMILIAR ROAR RIPPING ACROSS THE LAKE -- Ha turns -- they all do: coming toward them across the water

head_text.subj: WINGS AND RESISTANCE SPACECRAFT APPEAR, BEGIN FIRING AT T
PUSH IN ON HAN, HOPE SURGING

text: We have incoming at two-eight-point- six! Move! Dispatch! Move! Scramble all squads! Repeat, scramble all squads! Anti-air cover en route to our position!
It's the Resistance. One X-WING in particular -- MARKED IN BLACK -- SWOOPS DOW and takes out the parked TIE FIGHTERS and Troopers!
It's Poe Dameron at the stick of his X-wing.
Go straight ahead and don't let these dogs scare you!
Copy that!
We're with you, Poe! The Stormtroopers around Finn, Han and Chewie SCATTER, TO in EXPLOSIONS! The LIGHTSABER LANDS AGAIN -- FINN PICKS I UP.
Quick! Chewie picks up his Bowcaster, Han takes the blaster. Sho a Trooper.
Woohoo! YEAH! That's one helluva pilot!

In the darkened woods, Rey, terrified, keeps her blaster aimed. Her eyes dart around for her pursuer. And then: THE UNIQUE SOUND OF KYLO REN'S RASPING LIGHTSAB COMING TO LIFE -- A SOUND she's HEARD BEFORE in the FORCE Rey's heart skips a beat: she's even more scared now. Kylo Ren appears from behind a tree -- Rey FIRES again an again -- Kylo Ren moves toward her, USING HIS LIGHTSABER DEFLECT EVERY BLAST. She FIRES ferociously, but Kylo Ren keeps coming! His han rises -- Rey suddenly STOPS -- GASPS -- UNABLE TO MOVE.
The girl I've heard so much about. He walks AROUND HER, slowly, she won't let herself cry.
The droid. He comes around to see her face. After a scary beat he WH HIS SABER UP TO HER EYES, ILLUMINATING HER FACE.
Where is it?

head_text.subj: ORDER TROOPS, REFLECTED IN THE STILL LAKE.

text: Request air support!

Kylo Ren TURNS OFF HIS SABER, reaches up... and REACHES TOWARDS REY'S FACE. She can't move, strains in agony. Aft a beat, surprised by what he finds, he removes his hand. She is relieved but still afraid.

The map. You've seen it. Rey is horrified. He TOUCHES HER FACE again: the pain, te stream. Kylo Ren, taking more from her mind... She stares at him, TERRIFIED, straining in agony -- Kylo Ren, mid-interrogation, TURNS TOWARD THE SOUND OF TH EXPLOSIONS. Stormtroopers APPROACH through the woods.
Sir, Resistance fighters! We need more troops. Kylo Ren TURNS BACK TO Rey, his hand still on her face.
Pull the division out. Forget the droid. We have what we need. A GESTURE from Kylo Ren and REY LOSES CONSCIOUSNESS, FALL
The BLACK-MARKED X-WING SWOOPS DOWN again, FIRING, EXPLOD another TIE Fighter! On the ground:

Pull back the tree line! Han and Chewie dodge debris, FIRING and TAKING OUT TROOPE FINN takes out 2 TROOPERS with the blaster, then, out of breath, turns to see: Kylo Ren in the forest, CARRYING RE IN HIS ARMS, INTO HIS SHUTTLE! Finn's heart SHATTERS -- Han stops -- turns -- sees Kylo Ren entering his shuttle. Han is ROCKED.
Heroically, Finn runs toward the shuttle through LASER BL AND EXPLOSIONS, but the shuttle TAKES OFF -- Finn irratio
No, no, no, no... REY!! In crazed frustration, Finn stops running, watches the receding First Order ships, Rey their captive.
BB-8 moves fast, then stops and looks up as the First Ord ships RETREAT, OFF PLANET. A considered beat, and BB-8 he BACK FOR THE CASTLE.
Post battle. Finn runs to Han:
He took her! Did you see that? He took her. She's gone!
Yeah, yeah, I know... And he and Chewie head off.

Han moves toward a RESISTANCE TRANSPORT landing in the de BB-8 rolls up beside him, in wait for the transport. ON HAN'S FACE, knowing exactly what's about to happen. Finally, the transport door opens. And standing there is LEIA. She sees Han and is stunned. A silent beat, husband and wife reunited for the first time in years. In the smoke a embers, no one says a word. Then C-3PO walks out from the transport, into the field:
Goodness! Han Solo! It is I, See- Threepio! (sees Han, stops) You probably don't recognize me because of the red arm. (sees Leia,
Look who it is! Did you see who? Oh. Excuse me, Prin-- uh, General. Sorry. Come along, BB-8. Quickly.
Yes, I must get my proper arm reinstalled. He hurries off. Finally, alone again.
You changed your hair.
Same jacket.
No, new jacket. Chewie glad to see Leia, greets her with a hug. Chewie MO a few words, looks at Han then boards the ship. It is complicated and loving and painful. Han says, quiet
... I saw him. Leia, I saw our son. He was here. Leia hears this. Maz watches through the smoke.
The FALCON and surviving X-WINGS ROAR past camera toward PLANET WITH GREEN FLORA AND A RING OF ASTEROIDS.
This is D'QAR.
The SHIPS DESCENDING among grassy mounds and sunken structures.

LARGE GRASS MOUNDS cover HANGARS, beneath the odd, giant trees. BOOM DOWN as RESISTANCE GROUND CREW direct an X-WI to a LANDING. In the FOREGROUND, another X-wing canopy OP a PILOT climbs out. PAN TO REVEAL the landed Millennium Falcon. Finn runs down the ramp, UP TO CAMERA, desperate, searching. Then BB-8 SPEEDS RIGHT PAST HIM, almost knocking him down Finn watches as BB-8 rolls over to the PILOT GETTING OUT THE BLACK-MARKED X-WING. The Pilot's helmet comes off.

Finn can't believe what he's seeing. And Poe, kneeling in WARM REUNION with BB-8, listens and reacts to something t droid tells him. Poe looks up and sees Finn -- and he can believe it either! Poe smiles, points at Finn. From a distance, Finn gestures in sheer amazement that Poe is al
Poe. Poe Dameron. They move to each other -- and embrace.
You're alive!
So are you!
What happened to you?
What happened? I got thrown from the crash, woke up at night -- no you, no ship, nothing-- BB-8 BEEPS -- Poe listens, turns to Finn.
BB-8 says that you saved him.
No, no, no. It wasn't just me.
You completed my mission, Finn. That's my jacket?
Oh here.
No, no, no. Keep it. It suits you. You're a good man, Finn.
Poe -- I need your help.
