MOVE FAST with Finn and Poe. Finn takes in this makeshift command center, buried deep among vines and roots. They arrive at Leia, who stands with a group of Resistance Officers, including ADMIRALS ACKBAR and STATURA:
General Organa. Sorry to interrupt, this is Finn, he needs to talk to
(takes Finn's hand) And I need to talk to him. That was incredibly brave, what you did. Renouncing the First Order, saving this man's life --
(surprised she knows) Thank you, ma'am -- but a friend of mine was taken prisoner--
Han told me about the girl, I'm sorry. Finn is startled -- Poe jumps in:
Finn's familiar with the weapon that destroyed the Hosnian system. He worked on the base.
We're desperate for anything you can tell us.
That's where my friend was taken -- I've got to get there, fast.
And I will do everything I can to help, but first you must tell us all you know.
Chewbacca sits on a bed in the med bay. DR. KALONIA uses device to help heal his shoulder. Chewie TALKS.
That sounds very scary.
You must be so brave. Chewie agrees.

C-3PO takes the DATA DEVICE from BB-8 and inserts it into BASE COMPUTER. THE PROJECTED MAP APPEARS in HOLOGRAM. Lei enters, studying it, dispirited. PAN as she moves, REVEAL HAN. C-3PO is here and some others.

General, I regret to inform you, but this map recovered from BB-8 is only partially complete. And even worse, it matches no charted system on record. We simply do not have enough information to locate Master Luke.
I can't believe I was so foolish to think that I could just find Luke and bring him home.
Leia...
Don't do that.
Do what? She heads off.
Anything. Flummoxed, Han follows looking at C-3PO.
Princesses. Han follows Leia across the base floor:
I'm trying to be helpful!
When did that ever help? And don't say the Death Star.

LOW WITH BB-8 as he rolls over and finds, under a dark an dusty tarp in a corner, R2-D2. BB-8 BEEPS at R2, pulls of the tarp and tries to start a conversation. But R2 DOESN' RESPOND AT ALL. BB-8 tries again. Nothing. BB-8 NUDGES R2. Nothing. Then:
BB-8. You're wasting your time. BB-8 looks up at C-3PO, who stands there. C-3PO SIGHS.
It is very doubtful that R2 would have the rest of the map in his backup data.
I am afraid not. R2-D2 has been in low power mode ever since Master Luke went away. Sadly, he may never be his old self again.
Leia hears the change in Han's voice and softens. She tur
Listen to me, will you? I know every time you... every time you look at me, you're reminded of him.
You think I want to forget him? I want him back! Han looks at her with sympathy.
There was nothing we could've done. (hard for him to say) There was too much Vader in him.
That's why I wanted him to train with Luke. I just never should have sent him away. That's when I lost him. That's when I lost you both.
We both had to deal with it in our own way. I went back to the only thing I was ever good at.
We both did.
We lost our son, forever.
No.
It was Snoke. Han takes this in.
He seduced our son to the dark side. But we can still save him. Me. You.
If Luke couldn't reach him, how could
Luke is a Jedi... you're his father. There's still light in him. I know it.
General, the reconnaissance report on the enemy base is coming.
Rey wakes, disoriented. She is in an angled, upright restraining rig. Looks over, startled to see Kylo Ren, ma in place, standing there.
Where am I?
You're my guest.
Where are the others?
You mean the murderers, traitors and thieves you call friends? (Rey stares at him) You'll be relieved to hear that I have no idea.
Rey studies him. She's fearful... but curious.
You still want to kill me.

That happens when you're being hunted by a creature in a mask. Kylo Ren stops, considers her... then reaches up, unlatch and REMOVES HIS MASK. Rey reacts, stunned. It takes a mom before she regains her own mask of defiance.
Tell me about the droid.
(a nervous beat) He's a BB unit with a selenium drive and a thermal hyperscan vindicator --

He's carrying a section of a navigational chart. We have the rest, recovered from archives of the Empire. We need the last piece. And somehow, you convinced the droid to show it to you. You. A scavenger -- Rey reacts -- afraid -- how does he know?

You know I can take whatever I want. Trepidation flashes across Rey's eyes. Kylo Ren moves clo his hand rising toward her. She recoils, but has nowhere go. Kylo Ren nearly TOUCHES HER FACE... THEY'RE BOTH SURPRISED: they react to a feeling that pass between them -- AN ENERGY THEY RECOGNIZE IN EACH OTHER. And then it's gone. Adversaries again. Rey can't move, quietly strains in agony, trying to resist Ren's probing.

... You're so lonely... so afraid to leave... (then, slight smile) At night, desperate to sleep... you imagine an ocean. I see it -- I see the island... Tears stream down her face as she resists. She tries to break free, but can't budge.
And Han Solo. You feel like he's the father you never had. He would've disappointed you.
His hand still on her face, her eyes fierce through the a
-- Get out of my head -- But this just makes Kylo lean closer.
I know you've seen the map. It's in there... and now you'll give it to me. Don't be afraid. I feel it too. Where her strength comes from, she doesn't know, but:
I'm not giving you anything.

We'll see. He peers into her eyes intensely. She meets his gaze -- DESPITE THE PAIN SHE IS STRONG. On Ren's face as HIS CONFIDENCE BEGINS TO MELT AWAY. He h slammed up against a barrier in her mind. He looks less certain by the moment as Rey seems to GROW IN STRENGTH. T FEROCITY of confrontation builds until it hits critical m

... You... you're afraid... that you will never be as strong as... Darth Vader! KYLO REN SUDDENLY WITHDRAWS HIS HAND, as if her face were FIRE HOT. TAKES A STEP BACK, CONFUSED, RATTLED. Rey's bod is released, she breathes deeply, her powerful eyes still Kylo Ren, who starts to leave. And we PRELAP:
This scavenger, resisted you?
Kylo Ren, mask off, stands before Snoke.
She's strong with the Force, untrained but, stronger than she knows. And while Ren's mind no doubt goes to Luke:
And the droid?
Kylo Ren hesitates to reveal the truth. Then:
Ren believed it was no longer valuable to us. Ren turns back -- Hux enters the large space, moves to th platform beside Ren.
That the girl was all we needed. As a result, the droid has most likely been returned to the hands of the enemy. They may have the map already. Snoke is visibly furious.
Then the Resistance must be destroyed before they get to Skywalker.
We have their location. We tracked their reconnaissance ship to the Ileenium system.
Good. Then we will crush them once and for all. Prepare the weapon. Kylo Ren is stunned by the moment -- that isn't what he m at all --
Supreme Leader. I can get the map from the girl. I just need your guidance.
If what you say about this girl is true, bring her to me.

SLOW PUSH IN ON REY, shackled, mind still racing over wha happened between her and Kylo Ren. She is flooded with emotions, feeling her potential, her strength, that in th moment of being restrained, perhaps anything is possible. She turns to the Stormtrooper Guard. Studies him for an intense beat. Then says:
You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. The Stormtrooper Guard looks at her. A beat.
What did you say? Rey's eyes stay trained on him. She shifts in her seat, h confidence wavering, but she repeats, with authority:

You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. The Stormtrooper Guard, rifle aimed, MOVES FOR HER. Rey's heart pounds -- is she about to be killed, freed, o laughed at? The tension unbearable when the Guard says:
I'll tighten those restraints, scavenger scum!
LOW ANGLE: Kylo Ren, masked, rounds a corner, PASSES US.
Rey stares intently at the trooper. Calms herself. And tries again.
You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

I will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. He reaches down and UNLATCHES THE RESTRAINTS. HE THEN TUR AND STARTS TO HEAD OUT, her back to him as he exits. SHE IN SHOCK. Then tries, quickly:
And you will drop your weapon.

And I'll drop my weapon. The Trooper Guard DROPS HIS WEAPON without turning back - Rey HEARS the gun fall. She's incredulous. The guard has LEFT THE CELL, ITS DOOR OPEN. REY, in ABSOLUTE DISBELIEF, MOVES QUICKLY OUT OF FRAME!
Kylo Ren enters the cell -- we PUSH IN ON HIM as he takes the empty cell -- AND IMMEDIATELY UNDERSTANDS WHAT HAS HAPPENED.
Enraged, he RIPS OUT HIS SABER and --

WIDE ANGLE, empty corridor, toward the cell: we only HEAR the horrible SOUNDS. DESTRUCTION. YELLING. A few pieces of red hot DEBRIS BOUNCES into the corridor. Two STORMTROOPERS, crossing at the far end of the hall, S TO WATCH this display of pure FURY. They retreat, and fas
Workers at their controls. Vast snowy landscape seen outs Their GAUGES RISE -- THE WEAPON CHARGING SLOWLY --
Begin charging the weapon!
Yes, sir. Weapon charging.

A vast view of the planet -- a MASSIVE SOLARVAC ARRAY surrounds a port TEN MILES IN DIAMETER. MILLIONS OF PANELS turn on the ARRAY -- a wave of BRILLIA REFLECTIONS. Suddenly, like a planetary-scale TESLA COIL LINE OF ENERGY, THE POWER OF THE SUN begins to TRAVEL DOW to the Starkiller Base planet.

Finn, now a member of the inner circle of the Resistance, huddled with the group around the MAP TABLE, which displa a WIREFRAME HOLOGRAM of a ROLLING VIEW OF THE SURFACE OF STARKILLER BASE. With Finn are Han, Leia, Poe, C-3PO, Statura, Ackbar, Brance, SNAP, MAJOR EMATT (60), NIEN NUN and others. An urgent, messy strategy session --
The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.
They've somehow created a hyper lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.
A laser cannon?
We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale.
It's another Death Star.
I wish that were the case, Major. Poe hits a control. A WIREFRAME OF THE DEATH STAR APPEARS
This was the Death Star. Poe hits another control -- the Death Star SHRINKS -- AND SHRINKS AND SHRINKS, as the SURFACE AREA OF THE STARKILLE

head_text.subj: BASE IS DRAWN INTO A LARGER IMAGE, REVEALING THE ENTIRE B

text: PLANET. The Death Star is a minuscule SATELLITE in comparison.
This is Starkiller Base. This is news to many here, and they're stunned.
So it's big.
How is it possible to power a weapon of this size?
It uses the power of the sun. As the weapon is charged, the sun is drained until it disappears. An OFFICER runs up, hands Leia a DATACARD.
(eyes on datacard) The First Order: they're charging the weapon again, now. (then, heart sinking) Our system is the next target.
Oh my. Without the Republic fleet, we're doomed. They all react to this horrible news.
Okay, how do we blow it up? (all eyes on him) There's always a way to do that.
But no one has anything. Leia watches the silence, frustrated. Finally, rallying them:
Han's right. Han is surprised.
(at first hesitant) In order for that amount of power to be contained, that base would need some kind of thermal oscillator...
There is one. All eyes on Finn as he moves around the hologram to a loc on the Starkiller Base -- it is ZOOMED IN: A GIANT BLACK HEXAGONAL STRUCTURE.
Precinct 47. Here.
If we can destroy that oscillator, it might de-stabilize the core and cripple the weapon.
... Maybe the planet. Poe then tries to bolster spirits, looking at the BIG HEXAGONAL STRUCTURE: the Oscillator.
We'll go in there and we'll hit that oscillator with everything we got.
They have defensive shields that our ships cannot penetrate.
We disable the shields.
Kid, you worked there, what do you got?
(beat, then:) I can do it.
I like this guy.
I can disable the shields. But I have to be there, on the planet--
We'll get you there.
Han, how?
If I told you, you wouldn't like it.
So we disable the shields, take out the oscillator and we blow up their big gun. All right. Let's go! And everyone splits.

MISSION. Pilots inspect crafts, including Snap, Nien Nunb and Poe at his black-marked X-wing. Mechanics make adjustments as Crews fuel the jets. Ground controllers mo ships into takeoff formation. Pilots prep their ships, including BB-8, who is PULLED INTO Poe's black X-wing. Finn approaches Poe wearing the jacket. Poe slaps Finn's shoulder as he heads off. Finn watches Poe, despite it all, a little laugh. Over this:
Chewie and Finn follow Han's orders as they prepare the F for one more daring run, maybe its last:
Chewie, check that donal capitator. Come on. Let's go. -- Finn, be careful with those - they're explosives.
Now you tell me?
No matter how much we fought, I've always hated watching you leave. Han looks over, there's Leia.
That's what I did it. So you'd miss me. She laughs, moves up close to him.
I did miss you. He looks at her, says sweetly, out of the blue:
It wasn't all bad, was it? Huh? Some of it was...good.
... Pretty good.
Some things never change.

True. You still drive me crazy. Han places his hands on her shoulders. It could be thirty years ago. They both know there's a good chance he won't make it bac They pull each other tight, holding for dear life. Quietl
If you see our son again, bring him home.
Sir, sensors triggered in hangar 718. We're searching the area.
She's just beginning to test her powers. The longer it takes to find her, the more dangerous she becomes. Kylo exits.
TIGHT ON REY'S FACE as she peers nervously around a corne Rey runs down a long, glossy hall, taking cover in an alc the Trooper Guard's rifle HELD TIGHT.
The Falcon SCREAMS PAST --
Flying at LIGHTSPEED, Finn, with Han and Chewie.
How are we getting in?
Their shields have a fractional refresh rate. Keeps anything traveling slower than lightspeed from getting through. Finn is suddenly filled with dread.
We're gonna make our landing approach at lightspeed?! Chewie, thinking it's crazy too, says: HELL YES WE ARE!
Alright, Chewie, get ready. Chewie GROANS: he's ready. Han studies the PANEL INDICATO
And Now! Chewie and Han hit switches --
The Falcon's ENVIRONMENT SHIFTS INSTANTLY FROM LIGHTSPEED PLANET ATMOSPHERE -- it's suddenly FLYING 100 FEET ABOVE

head_text.subj: SNOWY, ROCKY GROUND, HEADED FOR A THICK FOREST

text: But the Falcon has no time -- it PLOWS through the trees! It then RISES --
ALARMS BLARE as the ship SLAMS THROUGH BRANCHES, SHOOTS T SKY! Han does his best to steer -- Chewie GROANS -- in th madness Han YELLS:
I get any higher, they'll see us! And the ship DIVES again, back into the trees!

A quiet CLEARING on the forest TREELINE. Suddenly the MILLENNIUM FALCON HURTLES OUT OF THE FOREST! From an erup of BRANCHES and PINE, the ship DIVES -- SLAMS INTO THE SN It DIGS THROUGH A THOUSAND YARDS OF WHITE until it finall comes to a canted stop, half buried in the snow!
Sir, she was not found in hangar 718 but all troops are on alert.
Put every hangar on lock-down. She's going to try to steal a ship to-- Suddenly, Kylo senses something. Something familiar.
Han Solo...

MASSIVE WIDE SHOT of an EPIC SNOWSCAPE. Han, Finn and Che cross the terrain. WALKERS appears on the horizon. Han, Finn and Chewie take cover behind a base structure. Chewi carries a BLACK DUFFEL of EXPLOSIVES.
The flooding tunnels are over that ridge. We'll get in that way.
What was your job when you were based here?
Sanitation.
Sanitation? Then how do you know how to disable the shields?
I don't. I'm just here to get Rey.
People are counting on us! The galaxy is counting on us--!
Solo, we'll figure it out! We'll use the Force!
That's not how the Force works--!
Chewie MOANTALKS.
Oh really, you're cold?
Come on! They follow Finn on the snowy hike. On the horizon, THE

head_text.subj: LASER SIPHON SHOOTING INTO THE SKY, SLOWLY SUCKING THE SU

text: Technicians at work, the SUN SUCKING seen in the window b him.
Report.
Weapon charged in fifteen minutes, sir.
A STORMTROOPER waits to board a Transport Compartment. Th door WHOOSHES open -- HAN, FINN and CHEWIE are there!
Hey! He fumbles for his blaster but Chewie shoots first. WIDE ANGLE of the corridor as the Trooper flies back, dead. Chewie drags him out of sight. Han and Finn peer around a corner, wary.
The longer we're here, less luck we're going to have. The shields?
I have an idea about that. Han and Chewie follow Finn.
Captain Phasma heads down a corridor, distant Stormtroope Suddenly Phasma is T-BONED HARD AND FAST -- SHOVED OUT OF
And now we're in a NARROW CROSS-CORRIDOR, CHEWIE WITH HIS

head_text.subj: ARMS AROUND PHASMA, FORCED TO FACE FINN, WHO HOLDS HIS BL

text: ON HIS FORMER CAPTAIN. Han stands behind Finn.
Remember me?
Not anymore. The name's Finn, and I'm in charge. I'm in charge now, Phasma. I'm in charge.
Bring it down. Bring it down.
Follow me. Finn SMILES as we CUT TO:

TIGHT ON REY'S FACE as she peers nervously around a corne Rey runs down a long, glossy hall, taking cover in an alc the Trooper Guard's rifle HELD TIGHT. From this alcove, she can see down another LONG, PERPENDI WALKWAY -- on one side, a STONE AND STEEL WALL. On the ot side, a VAST ATRIUM, with a railing-free DROP OFF, the wh pill-light design descending HUNDREDS OF FEET. At the end of this walkway is an OPEN HANGAR DOOR, reveal HUNDREDS OF TIE FIGHTERS parked outside. TIGHT on Rey's face as her plan is clear. But the problem between her and the ship she wants to steal, is a GROUP O STORMTROOPERS. Guards, in conversation. As she tries to think about what to do next, we see, FAR BEHIND HER in the perpendicular hall, ANOTHER GROUP OF ST and SNOWTROOPERS headed her way! Rey's mind races -- another peek out and she RUNS FAST, a the walkway, and CLIMBS DOWN -- her fingertips disappeari over the edge just as the Troopers approach and continue. WIDE SHOT as Rey holds on carefully as the guards walk of not seeing her over the edge, a death drop below her. But then she SEES SOMETHING and has a brainstorm. She strenuously cross-climbs to an invisible SERVICE HATCH, w She opens, and climbs INSIDE THE WALL, closing the hatch behind her.

A REMARKABLE IMAGE, inside the inner workings of the base Tiny by comparison, Rey climbs amid the incredible infrastructure, a drop to infinity beneath her. She is between the LIGHT SOURCE and the WHITE PILL SHAPES, as sh makes her way ACROSS.

WIDE SHOT of the Stormtrooper GUARDS, above the drop off into the atrium. What they cannot see is a SHADOWED SILHOUETTE OF REY against the ENDLESS WHITE PILL LIGHTS a she climbs across the space, beneath them, toward her exi
CLOSE AS PHASMA SITS INTO FRAME in front of a WORKSTATION Finn, Han and Chewie, blasters aimed. Phasma reluctantly works controls on the workstation.
You want me to blast that bucket off your head? Lower the shields.
You're making a big mistake.
Do it. Chewie MOAN/TALKS. Phasma hits a few more buttons -- the controls BEEP-CLICK. "SHIELDS DISABLE INITIATE". Eyes on
Solo, if this works, we're not going to have a lot of time to find Rey.
Don't worry kid, we won't leave here without her. The controls BEEP-CLICK. "SHIELDS DISABLED".
(to Finn, cruel) You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy. My troops will storm this block and kill you all.
I disagree. What do we do with her?
Is there a garbage chute? Trash compactor?
Yeah, there is...
An ALERT: OFFICERS at their consoles, OVERLAPPING, urgent
General, their shields are down!
Thank the Maker!
Han did it! Send them in!
Give Poe full authorization to attack.
Black Leader, go to sub-lights. On your call.
At LIGHTSPEED, Poe pilots:
Roger, base -- red squad, blue squad, take my lead.
Nien Nunb pilots, acknowledges order in alien language.
Another pilot, ZOLO ZIFF.
Dropping out of lightspeed.
With CONCUSSIVE BLASTS, the X-WINGS APPEAR and ROAR PAST CAMERA toward the Starkiller Base planet!
The CRASHED FALCON, two parked TIE FIGHTERS and a TROOP TRANSPORT VEHICLE beside it.
At a distance, the X-WINGS DROP FROM THE SKY, TOWARD THE

head_text.subj: HEXAGONAL OSCILLATOR STRUCTURE IN THE DISTANCE

text: The squad of X-wings DIVE BOMBS the Oscillator, the Black Falcon leads. INTERCUT BETWEEN THIS AND VARIOUS X-WINGS.
Almost in range! Hit the target dead center, as many runs as we can get!
Snap pilots.
Approaching target.
Nien Nunb acknowledges.
LARGE EXPLOSIONS atop the DISTANT OSCILLATOR, seen throug the large windows! ALARMS BLARE in here -- we PULL BACK a Hux moves quickly to see the damage, he turns sharply to First Order Officer:
Dispatch all squadrons...
Yes, General.
Let's light it up!

head_text.subj: DIVE BOMBING THE OSCILLATOR, HITTING IT DEAD CENTER IN QU

text: Direct hit!
But no damage! Jess reacts.
Yeah, we gotta keep hitting it! Another bombing run! Remember, when that sun is gone, that weapon will be ready to fire! But as long as there's light, we got a chance.
A BEEPING from BB-8, riding in the back of his X-wing, an Poe looks out -- can't believe what he's seeing: DOZENS O
Guys, we got a lot of company!
Finn, Han and Chewie take cover, Chewie pulling some EXPLOSIVES out of the duffel. Blast doors nearby.
We'll use the charges to blow that blast door. I'll go in and draw fire, but I'm gonna need cover.
You sure you're up for this?

Hell no -- I'll go in find and try to find Rey -- (improvising, fast) -- The troopers'll be on our tail. We have to be ready for that. There's an access tunnel that'll leads -- (Han starts pointing with his chin to

Why are you doing that? Why are you doing -- this? I'm trying to come up with a plan. Finn turns -- AND SEES REY, CLIMBING OUT FROM INSIDE THE WALL, carefully climbing back up to the main level! He ca believe it! Chewie MURMURS his relief. Han is maybe more grateful than anyone.
A Resistance Technician turns to Leia:
The Oscillator's still standing.
X-wings coming back for another round of attacks!
Rey climbs up to the corridor, vigilant. She hears a SOUN SWOOPS her rifle at -- Finn, Han and Chewie! She cannot believe it! All Finn wants to do is hug her -- and she hi
Are you all right?
Yeah.
Good.
What happened -- did he hurt you?
Finn. What are you doing here?!
We came back for you. She is speechless -- this is all she's ever wanted anyone do. Chewie TALKS -- and Rey's eyes nearly tear up.
What'd he say?
(shrugs, smiles, though nearly in tears) ... That it was your idea. Finn awkwardly smiles. It's his nature. They embrace.
Thank you.
How did you get away?
I can't explain it. And you wouldn't believe it.
Escape now. Hug later.

The X-Wings DOGFIGHT with the TIE Fighters on the surface the snowy planet. INTERCUT BETWEEN the ships SCREAMING pa each other, and the COCKPITS of the Resistance and First Order fighters. Poe's fighter NEARLY COLLIDES with a clos passing TIE Fighter!
I got one behind me. See it?
Yeah, I'm on it!
A heavy cannon emplacement launches a missile that shreds X-wing fighter.
Furillo's been hit!
Watch out for ground fire!

The X-wings ROAR across the sky, BLASTING and DODGING the TIE Fighters and missiles. PULL BACK TO REVEAL Han, Finn, Rey and Chewie, who run ou here, into the snow, stopping, eyes on the sky, watching lop-sided battle.

head_text.subj: THE FOUR HEROES TURN TO EACH OTHER, RESOLVE IN THEIR EYES

text: A long moment of communication.
They're in trouble. We can't leave. (to Finn, re: Chewie) My friend here has a bag full of explosives. Let's use 'em.
A Resistance Technician turns to Leia:
General, are you seeing this?
Two more X-wings down. That's half our fleet destroyed.
And their weapon will be fully charged in 10 minutes! It would take a miracle to save us now.

Han and Chewie arrive here to find THREE SECURITY STORMTROOPERS approaching a Maintenance Hatch. Instantly, Chewie takes out the middle one with his Bowcaster. Han a the other two Stormtroopers OPEN FIRE, but Han's aim is t

Running inside from a parked snowspeeder, Rey opens a ser hatch. Finn behind her, as she reaches into the mechanics of the place, very much like the very first shot we saw o Rey. And she YANKS a piece of TECH from the machinery and:
The HATCH OPENS! Han and Chewie, having been on the looko step inside, weapons poised. Chewie MOANS.
That girl knows her stuff.
Han and Chewie divide the explosives. Talk in hushed tone
We'll set the charges at every other column. He GROAN/TALKS to Han, who looks around, reconsiders.
You're right. That's a better idea. (checks his detonator) You take the top.
I'll go down below. Detonator. We'll meet back here. They head off in opposite directions.
Han finishes placing an explosive. Checks he's all-clear and hurries down to the next level. Chewie climbs up a le
A SQUAD of Stormtroopers SNAP to alert as Kylo Ren approa CONTROLS ARE HIT and the huge DOOR OPENS. Without hesitat Kylo walks INTO THE OSCILLATOR.
A COLOSSAL CYLINDRICAL STRUCTURE. DARK CORRIDORS and CATWALKS. Kylo Ren comes to a stop. Scans the structure. SENSING SOMETHING, he motions the Stormtrooper Squad upwa
Find them. They rush past him. Kylo Ren turns slowly, and HEADS DOWN

The Stormtroopers move up the ramp, weapons ready, checki carefully where blind corners intersect from the perimete They come round to the next higher level and PASS CLOSE T CAMERA. When they've passed, TILT to find CHEWIE, in the shadows of the grillwork.
Once they're gone, he plants another charge.
The Snowspeeder comes to a stop outside the structure. Fi and Rey stop for a moment, look to the sky: THE SUN IS NE GONE.

Han finishes setting a charge and is about to move on whe he HEARS SOMETHING and conceals himself behind a wide, vertical support. He peaks around the edge and his whole demeanor changes -- HAN'S POV: Kylo Ren appears and stops at the railing, loo down into the filter. Han looks at his son with a tortured storm of feelings. WE'RE WITH KYLO REN as he resumes his hunt. He heads dire toward WHERE HAN IS HIDING! Kylo Ren has an INCREASING SE OF HAN'S PRESENCE as he moves closer. He comes to where H was hiding -- but HAN IS NOWHERE TO BE SEEN. From his hiding place in a narrow, POWER CHAMBER in the w HAN WATCHES HIS SON PASS ONLY A FEW FEET IN FRONT OF HIM. Han SHIFTS HIS POSITION in the tight compartment, so he c watch Ren's progress. Kylo Ren turns onto a FLAT BRIDGE THAT BISECTS the open space. Unaware of his father, Kylo Ren walks purposefully across the opposite side. Han watches his son walk off -- the CL CLANK of Kylo Ren's boots receding. This is Han's opportunity to escape but Leia's words echo through his mind. He makes a decision and moves out, to t edge of the catwalk. He calls out, strongly:
Ben! The name ECHOES as Kylo Ren STOPS, far across the vast catwalk. He turns.

Han Solo. I've been waiting for this day for a long time. Finn and Rey make their way into the space, opening a HAT that allows A BEAM OF PRECIOUS SUNLIGHT to stream down li a spotlight on Han and his son. Finn and Rey get to a rai and look down. They can SEE and HEAR Han and Kylo Ren on the catwalk below.
Take off that mask. You don't need it.
What do you think you'll see if I do? Han moves toward Kylo Ren.
The face of my son. Kylo TAKES OFF HIS MASK. Han is JOLTED -- seeing the face of his son for the first time as a man.
Your son is gone. He was weak and foolish, like his father. So I destroyed him.
That's what Snoke wants you to believe but it's not true. My son is alive. SEVERAL LEVELS BELOW them, CHEWIE comes to the rail to wa
Kylo flares.
No. The Supreme Leader is wise. UP ABOVE, Finn, Chewie and Rey watch, rapt. Stormtroopers dot the perimeter of the structure, watching the scene. ON THE BRIDGE, Han moves closer, stern:
Snoke is using you for your power. When he gets what he wants, he'll crush you -- you know it's true. Kylo hesitates. Somehow, he does know it.
It's too late.
No it's not. Leave here with me. Come home. We miss you. For the first time, Kylo Ren seems truly conflicted. Tear flood his stoic eyes...
I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain.
Han takes one step toward his son, but stops himself.
I know what I have to do, but I don't know if I have the strength to do it. Will you help me? Han hears his son's voice again, pained and vulnerable.

Yes. Anything. Kylo Ren unholsters his lightsaber and SLOWLY EXTENDS IT Han, within a foot of Han's chest. Han almost can't belie it. The moment seems to last forever. And just then, the LAST BEAM OF SUNLIGHT streaming through the open hatch VANISHES. Han actually smiles -- and reaches out for the dark weapo but with the light now gone, KYLO REN'S EYES FILL WITH

head_text.subj: OUT, RIGHT THROUGH HAN'S CHEST AND BACK

text: Thank you. ABOVE, Finn and Rey GASP -- SCREAM --
Solo.

No, no. Han's last moment is looking into his son's face. HAN'S KNEES BUCKLE. The blade tilts down with him... until KYLO REN EXTINGUISHES IT AND HAN HOLDS onto the catwalk -- his life slipping away. Finally Han FALLS BACK, OFF THE CATWALK, INTO THE DEPTHS
Leia, feeling it instantly -- knowing -- drops into a sea DEVASTATED.

Kylo Ren is somehow WEAKENED by this wicked act. Himself horrified. His SHOCK is broken only when -- CHEWIE CRIES OUT IN AGONY! Chewie furiously FIRES AT KYLO REN, HITTING HIM IN THE SIDE! Kylo Ren falls back, stunne

Our MUSIC TAKES OVER, EPIC AND HEARTBREAKING as Stormtroo FIRE AT CHEWIE, who is forced to retreat down a corridor, where he holds the EXPLOSIVE REMOTE -- he PUSHES THE BUTT Hearing ONLY OUR SCORE, FIRST ONE, then TWO, then FOUR, t SIX EXPLOSIONS rock the structure -- CATWALKS FALL as the walls CAVE IN! Kylo Ren SEES REY AND FINN, WATCHING THE EXPLOSIONS IN SH then they SEE KYLO REN, WHO RECOGNIZES THEM BOTH, WITH ASTONISHMENT. He rises to his full height and heads for them with long strides. Stormtroopers begin to BLAST AWAY AT REY AND FINN! CRAZED

head_text.subj: REY FIRES BACK AS BLASTS HIT AROUND HER. FINN WRAPS AN AR
AROUND HER AND DRAGS/CARRIES HER OUT OF SIGHT

text: The Oscillator's been damaged but is still functional. COMMODORE META reacts.
Admiral, their weapon will fire in two minutes.
From a distance the oscillator is ablaze and fractured fr the explosives. Then Rey and Finn appear, coming over a rising, running into a bare-tree snowy forest.

The Falcon's this way. Finn and Rey, overcome with emotion, race through the sno forest -- until Finn SLOWS AND STOPS. Rey stops too, both out of breath. They look at each other. They both know: they can't run.

Kylo Ren moves through the trees -- until he STOPS. Takes out the saber, ignites it. A still figure amidst the gusts of wind and snow. STANDING THIRTY FEET AWAY, FACING HIM, ARE FINN AND REY. Finn holds LUKE'S LIGHTSABER, Rey the Stormtrooper BLASTE
We're not done yet.
You're a monster!

It's just us now. Han Solo can't save you. After a beat, Rey moves forward with the blaster -- AIMS Kylo Ren RAISES A HAND -- Rey struggles under his FORCE P she can't fire -- he strains too, especially with the WOU Chewie inflicted. Kylo Ren GESTURES POWERFULLY -- Rey's BLASTER FLIES OUT OF HER HAND -- another GESTURE and Rey FLIES BACK and SLAMS INTO A TREE thirty feet away! She drops -- LANDS HARD in the snow. Dazed, hurt.

Rey! Rey! Rey... Rey... Oh no. Oh no no no... Finn turns to her, afraid and concerned. But the SOUND OF KYLO REN'S LIGHTSABER moving makes Finn TURN BACK TO KYLO REN, lit by the glowing YELLOW AND RED BLADE.
In reply, Finn TURNS ON LUKE'S LIGHTSABER -- upon seeing weapon, Kylo Ren REACTS IN SHOCK.
That lightsaber. It belongs to me!

Come get it. Despite his fear, Finn raises his blade in welcome. Kylo Ren CHARGES at him - Finn terrified -- Kylo Ren LUNGES bu Finn DEFLECTS Ren's SPARK-SPITTING blade! Kylo Ren TURNS, ATTACKS, CUTS -- amazingly Finn BLOCKS, COUNTER-ATTACKS -- clearly IMPRESSES KYLO REN, who only e this challenge more! Rey RECOVERS, gets her bearings. Her eyes focus on the tw men fighting, through the trees. Kylo Ren is obviously hampered by his wound, yet he attac with a primal SAVAGERY -- Finn BLOCKS, turning DEFENSIVE moves into OFFENSIVE ones. And he ACTUALLY GETS A HIT IN! LUKE'S SABER GRAZING KYLO REN'S ARM! Kylo MOVES BACK -- wounded, but more enraged than weakened. Kylo Ren CHARGES AGAIN -- their WEAPONS POUND, SPARKS FLY, their blades LO the men are CLOSE, LIT BY the powerful, CRASHING sabers: And Kylo Ren PUSHES FINN BACK, attacks with pure ferocity Finn is stunned -- unprepared for this fierceness. Rey sees this -- Kylo Ren unleashes a MERCILESS SERIES OF BLOWS, pushing Finn further and further back until he los balance.
That's when KYLO REN STRIKES: HE LANDS A BLOW TO FINN'S T

head_text.subj: LUKE'S LIGHTSABER FLIES FROM FINN'S HAND, THROWN TWENTY F

text: Kylo Ren TURNS OFF HIS LIGHTSABER and REACHES FOR LUKE'S LIGHTSABER -- BECKONING IT WITH THE FORCE. LUKE'S LIGHTSABER VIBRATES IN THE SNOW. Kylo Ren GESTURES, INCREASES HIS POWER -- LUKE'S LIGHTSAB

head_text.subj: FINALLY FLIES OUT OF THE SNOW, BULLETS TOWARD KYLO REN --
KYLO REN TURNS TO SEE LUKE'S LIGHTSABER LAND IN THE HAND
REY, WHO STANDS, FACING HIM, HAVING REACHED FOR IT HERSEL
BUT UTTERLY STUNNED THAT IT LANDED IN HER HAND

text: Holding it with both hands, SHE IGNITES LUKE'S LIGHTSABER FOR THE FIRST TIME, HER EYES BLAZING. Kylo Ren IGNITES HIS SABER. It's REY who charges now -- Kylo Ren immediately on the defensive. They BATTLE POWERFULLY -- He is clearly rocked by her raw, innate skill.
We just lost R-1!
We're overwhelmed! What do we do? It isn't working! Another pilot looks down -- SEES THE EXPLOSION -- coming from the OSCILLATOR. Relatively small, it's an opening:
Black Leader, there's a brand new hole in that oscillator. Looks like our friends got in!
Red Four! Red Six! Cover us!
I'm on it!
Roger!
Everybody else, hit the target hard! Give it everything you got! And the X-WINGS DIVE and BLAST the OSCILLATOR --
Another two X-wings -- including Poe's -- soar through th trench leading to the oscillator structure!
I need some help here! I need some help!
I'm coming in!
Watch out!
I'm hit! The alien pilot's X-wing is blasted to pieces.
All teams - I'm going in! Pull up and cover me!
Copy that, Black Leader! Good luck, Poe! The trailing X-wings peel off as Poe's black fighter dart into the fiery breach.
Outside, the SUN ALMOST COMPLETELY GONE -- PULL BACK THRO

head_text.subj: THE WINDOW TO REVEAL A STARKILLER TECHNICIAN

text: Weapon at full capacity in thirty seconds.
Prepare to fire.
Poe's X-wing weaves through the breach. A pursuing TIE fighter does not clear the gap, leaving Poe to circle the interior of the unguarded structure, firing volley after volley of torpedoes.
The remaining X-Wings -- including Poe's -- BLAST the pla and the structure begins to CRATER, deep underground

Amid the BARE WHITE TREES, ONLY TWO LIGHTSABERS -- LUKE'S BLUE AND REN'S YELLOW-RED -- ILLUMINATE the FLURRIES OF S as Rey and Kylo Ren BATTLE HARD. She seems to be, impossibly, STRONGER THAN HE IS for half dozen blows -- until he FINDS HIS STRENGTH and FIGHTS BAC MOVING FORWARD and PUSHING REY BACK, into the forest. Suddenly a COLOSSAL CHUNK OF THE FOREST RIGHT BEHIND REY DROPS AWAY! Rey is suddenly fighting on the EDGE OF A
You need a teacher! I can show you the ways of the Force!

The Force. Rey closes her eyes for a long beat. When Rey opens them, she is centered, fortified, and she POUNDS BACK, SINGLE H SWIPES, hitting Ren's gnarly, spitting saber with incredi FORCE. It's so fast now, so furious, that Kylo Ren FALLS BACK -- She ATTACKS HARDER! Ren gets up again but she HITS HIS SABER'S HILT -- HIS BL GOES FLYING OFF, TUMBLING INTO THE SNOW -- and she SLASHE

head_text.subj: AGAIN AND AGAIN AND HITS KYLO REN SQUARE IN THE HEAD AND
CHEST. HE GOES DOWN, SUDDENLY A FEARFUL MAN, A LARGE BURN

text: SCAR SLASHED ACROSS HIS FACE! He still reaches for his sa And she could kill him -- right now, with ONE VICIOUS STR But she stops. Realizing she stands on a greater edge tha even the cliff -- the edge of the dark side. The earth SHAKES. The earth splits. A gully forms.

The area where the RALLY was held is now COLLAPSING into giant sink hole! We WHIP PAN to a YOUNG TECHNICIAN, who watches this out the control room window in horror. He hurries off, passing COLONEL DATOO, who admonishes:
Lieutenant, get back to your station!
(stops, fleetingly) Just look. We won't survive -- even Hux has gone! As he hurries off, WE HEAR:
Supreme Leader.
Hux stands before SNOKE'S IMAGE. Relative quiet here, but distant SOUNDS OF DESTRUCTION. Hux tries to keep it toget but is horrified, heartsick:
The fuel cells have ruptured. The collapse of the planet has begun. Snoke takes this in. Furious, desolate... knowing.
Leave the base at once and come to me with Kylo Ren.
It is time to complete his training.

Rey turns, runs a hundred feet through the forest to: FINN, who lies, near death, not far from where the GROUND FELL AWAY. Rey falls to her knees near him, turns him ove sees his cauterized but possibly fatal wound.

Finn! Finn... Tears come to her eyes as she lifts him, holds his lifele body in her arms. Snow flurries around them as she cries, holding this boy who she just met, who she already adores They are left here to die -- nearby MORE TREES DROP as th planet continues to COLLAPSE. And just as it seems like a is lost... Her wet eyes look up to see:

head_text.subj: LIGHTS RISE FROM THE NEWLY-FORMED CANYON

text: KNOW -- IT'S THE MILLENNIUM FALCON -- and its lights

head_text.subj: ILLUMINATE REY, WHOSE FACE FILLS WITH HOPE

text: CHEWIE IS AT THE CONTROLS. He ROARS to them!
Chewie exits the ship. MOMENTS LATER Chewie CARRIES FINN up the ramp. Rey hurrie with them back into the ship --
Chewie carries Finn inside, followed by Rey.
And we FLY WITH THE FALCON as it leaves the planet -- we see CHEWIE AND REY PILOTING, the COLLAPSING PLANET BEHIND US. The Resistance X-wings, led by Poe, follow the Falcon
All teams! I got eyes on them!

Yes! The X-wings ROAR OFF, skyward as the MUSIC SOARS, the PLA IMPLODES -- THE SUNLIGHT IT CONTAINS BURSTS FORTH, and as get further and further distance from what was Starkiller Base, we witness the REBIRTH OF A SUN. Light restored to corner of the galaxy. The Millennium Falcon and the X-wings RIP THROUGH SPACE, headed home.
Our job's done here. Let's go home!
ESTABLISHING SHOT as the Falcon on the landing strip.

The Falcon has landed among the remaining Resistance ship Poe is there, watching as Chewie scuttles down the ramp carrying an unconscious Finn. Medical Personnel and Offic meet them, usher them inside.

Easy, easy. He's hurt. We've got a heartbeat. Rey walks down the ramp and sees, for the first time, Lei C-3PO and BB-8 behind her. The crowds are cheering. Rey is so sad for Leia, so sorry. The two women move for each other. And Leia takes Rey's face in her hands. Despite her heartbreak, she is gratefu She embraces Rey. A mother's embrace. Rey cries, too, in this emotional first meeting.
Chewbacca sits quietly, as do many in the base, mourning their losses. As BB-8 approaches R2-D2, the long dormant droid suddenly stirs. The droids beep at each other.
R2-D2! You've come back! You found what? How dare you call me that!
(he swats R2-D2, who
Find Master Luke how? Come, R2! We must go tell the others at once!
Leia stands alone and in silence, heartbroken.
General? Excuse me, General? Leia turns to see droids.
R2-D2 may contain some much needed good news.
Tell me. Rey stands with Leia, Poe C-3PO, BB-8 and a handful of Resistance Officers. Suddenly R2-D2 PROJECTS A HOLOGRAM!

head_text.subj: LARGE NAVIGATIONAL MAP WITH A SPECIFIC MISSING CHUNK

text: BB-8 BEEPS -- Poe turns to him --

Yeah, all right, buddy, hold on -- Poe runs over -- removes the ancient data device that Lor San Tekka had given him from a base computer. He inserts back inside BB-8, who then PROJECTS HIS MAP -- which he SHRINKS DOWN TO SIZE -- and the two droids MOVE SLIGHTLY
Everyone REACTS -- amazed --
Oh! The map! It is complete!
(hand on her heart) -- Luke -- Suddenly there are CHEERS AND EMBRACES. C-3PO leans down to R2-D2 and says, quietly, sweetly:
(to R2-D2) Oh my dear friend. How I've missed you.
A NEW DAY. Finn, unconscious in an I.C.U. POD. His fate uncertain. Rey sits with him. Deeply worried. Finally she leans in, close to him. She kisses him and says, quietly, despite her fear:
We'll see each other again. I believe that. Thank you, my friend.
Chewie does last minute checks of the Falcon. Rey stands with Leia a beat and then turns to head to the Falcon. As Rey walks off, she hears Leia call out:
Rey. Rey turns around.
May the Force be with you. This fills Rey up. She smiles gratefully. Rey crosses to the Falcon.
Rey sits in the pilot seat, Chewie as co-pilot. Rey looks at him compassionately. Rey FLICKS SWITCHES and --
The Millennium Falcon RISES. Leia, with Poe, BB-8, and C-3PO (with his proper arm replaced), watches the next generation of Jedi begin her journey.
The Falcon FLIES through space and BLASTS to LIGHTSPEED.

A pristine and mighty OCEAN. Endless BLUE, dotted with random, beautiful, mountainous BLACK ROCK ISLANDS, dotted with countless GREEN TREES. The Millennium Falcon FLIES INTO VIEW, BANKS toward one o the ISLANDS.

Rey, her staff strapped to her back, begins her hike up t considerable mountain, glancing back at Chewie and R2-D2, who watch her from the bottom of the ramp. A deep breath and Rey continues her journey.
Built within the rock and foliage of this idyllic island seemingly endless ANCIENT STONE STEPS. Rey continues to climb them, determined, despite her fatigue.

Rey arrives at a clearing. Small, modest, primitive stone structures. But no one around. Rey walks past them, sees, senses no one. And then she stops. Feels something. She turns. Standing forty feet away from her, his back to us, is a M in a CLOAK AND ROBE. Rey stares, knowing exactly who it is. But she just stare for what seems like forever. Until he finally TURNS, SLOW to her. Pulls back his hood. IT IS LUKE SKYWALKER. Older now, white hair, bearded. He looks at Rey. A kindne in his eyes, but there's something tortured, too. He does need to ask her who she is, or what she is doing here. Hi look says it all. In response, Rey pulls something from the pack. LUKE'S LIGHTSABER. And she holds it out to him. An offer. A plea. The galaxy only hope. HOLD ON LUKE SKYWALKER'S INCREDIBLE FACE, amazed and conflicted at what he sees, as our MUSIC BUILDS, the prom of an adventure, just beginning...
